Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ nakaʉɓɨkya ambɛ, mʉmbanzʉ kigilyi kaɨɓʉkʉta, kakwananɨgʉ kaɨna Ɓʉngama ko Kunzi»
Nikodimo amuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Igyonosa lɨkɨ mʉmbanzʉ kayɨɓʉkʉta ɓata nɨ a kʉwa mbɔkʉ-mbɔkʉ? Akwananatʉ ɓata kogulya ka mʉma ka amakɨ, ɨgɨlya kaɨɓʉkʉta?»
Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakaʉɓɨkya ambɛ, mʉmbanzʉ kiɓukuti ko liɓo na ka Lɨmbɛngɨ, kakwananɨgʉ kogulya ka Ɓʉngama ko Kunzi.
Nɨnɔ ɨɓʉkʉtaga na ɓomikya-ɓambanzʉ, a mʉmbanzʉ, nɨnɔ ɨɓʉkʉtaga na Lɨmbɛngɨ ko Kunzi a lɨmbɛngɨ.
Wakombomboyonitɔgʉ ka nɨlɔ nuɓikyi ɓɛ: ‹Wokwononi kaɨgɨlya kaɨɓʉkʉta.›
Ovivi ovivaga pa yasɨ kʉ apaga mino. Ʉkanagatʉ kukwo yi, luki limoti, wakibogigʉ ɓɛ apʉnyaga yanɨ ikanɨ ɨndaga yanɨ. Igyonosaga ɓɛgɛyɔ ka mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ ɨɓʉkʉta na Lɨmbɛngɨ ko Kunzi.»
Kʉwa wa, Nikodimo amuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Lɨkpʉmʉka nɨlɔ igyonosa lɨkɨ?»
Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Muwonisilo mudingi ka mugi ma Izaleli ɓɛyɔ wo mino yɔ, wakibigʉ lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɨ?
A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakaʉɓɨkya ambɛ, iɓusu, taɓɨkyaga makpʉmʉka nɨmɔ tibogo, ta ɓadɛmʉ ɓa nɨmɔ tinoni. Luki limoti, iɓunu, makapagɨgʉ katɨɓɨnɨkyana.
Makɛbaɨlyagɨgʉ gʉtʉgʉ iki yi aka ngbingo yi nɨnɔ namʉnzɨnɨlyaga mino ko bulya makpʉmʉka ma lɨtɔmbʉ. Angɛnɛngɛnɛ kʉwa ka makpʉmʉka ma kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ aka?
Wɨna sɛ, kɛgʉ na mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka nɨnɔ oɗokoni kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ, kiki asɨ Mika-Mʉmbanzʉ aka nɨnɔ osyoku ndɨ ɨyɨ kʉ.
Mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛgɛyɔ Musa aɗokisa ndɨ mino nzʉka wa ngwɛyɨ kʉgʉ wa mʉngbɨngɨlɨ kʉ ka ɨsa
, okwononi ɓɛ ɓaɗokisi Mika-Mʉmbanzʉ ɓɛgɛyɔ,
iba mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ aɓɨnɨkyana inisoni na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ.
A ɓɛyɔ, Kunzi apa ndɨ ɔɓɨlɨ kʉgbɛ. Kinili, apá ndɨ mino Mikakɨ wa ɓemoti, kyɛ mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ aɓɨnɨkyana koɓungogonitɔgʉ, luki limoti, inisoni na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ.
Kunzi katikokugʉ ndɨ Mikakɨ kakɔ mʉkɔmbʉ ka ɔɓɨlɨ. Luki limoti, atikoku ndɨ kahukuso yi.
Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ aɓɨnɨkyana, ɓakabisigʉ na mʉkɔmbʉ. Luki limoti, nɨnɔ kaɓɨnɨkyanagʉ, ɓabisoni na mʉkɔmbʉ, kyɛ kaɓɨnɨkyanagʉ Miki wa ɓemoti ko Kunzi.
Winoni ɓɛyɔ Kunzi akɔgɔ mino mʉkɔmbʉ: ɓʉngbanganya odonuku ndɨ ka ɔɓɨlɨ, luki limoti, ɓambanzʉ ɓapaga ɨɓʉ biti aka kakɨtaga ɓʉngbanganya kyɛ yɨgya kaɓʉ a yanyɛ.
Mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ agyaga ɓʉnyɛ, amʉyaga ɓʉngbanganya ɓafɛ. Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ, amʉyaga kakpʉɗa ɓʉngbanganya, kyɛ yɨgya kakɨ yanyɛ kinisononi.
Luki limoti, nɨnɔ agyaga lɨkpʉmʉka la lɨngʉnʉ odogoku ɨyɨ ka ɓʉngbanganya, kyɛ yɨgya kakɨ inisoni ɓɨnza ɓɛ akaɓyɛnɛnɛ na sɨpananɨsɔ ko Kunzi.»
Kumbuso yi, Yeso na ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓaga ndɨ ka iwili ya Yudɛa. Ika ndɨ pa imoti na ɨɓʉ kʉ ɓɛyɔ ka masyɛ, anuɓotiso ɓambanzʉ.
Yuani atʉ ndɨ gɔnɨ ɨyɨ kauɓotiso ɓambanzʉ ka Ainoni, ɓuwobi na Salimu kyɛ liɓa a ndɨ lakpʉ kʉ ɓɛyɔ. Ɓambanzʉ ɓadulyogoku ndɨ, anuɓotiso.
Ko ngbingo yi nɨnɔ, ɓa mbɛyɨ ndɨ nɨ ɓakanamokyigʉ Yuani ka ligbito.
Kʉwa wa, ɓaɓɨɓya ɓemoti-ɓemoti ka Yuani ɓapʉnga ndɨ ɓoɗongoso na Muyuda ɓemoti kʉgʉ wa yɨgya kaɓʉ ko bulya kiɓuɓiso.
Ɓɨnda ndɨ ka Yuani, ɓaɓikyoku ɓɛ: «Muwonisilo, alʉkʉ yi nɨnɔ ma ndʉkʉ na ɨɓʉ kʉsyakʉ wa Yɔlɔdanɨ, nɨnɔ watʉmbʉlaga ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka kakɨ, a kʉwa gɔnɨ koɓotiso. Ɓatʉ ɓasɨ ɓakagbɔ kʉ o mino!»
Yuani usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Kɛgʉ na mʉtʉ ɓemoti nɨnɔ akwanana kainisono no luki, kanɨ Kunzi kapágʉ ndɨ.
Iɓunu ɓamombukwana-donu ɓi mɛmʉkanatʉ ndɨ kaɓɨkya ɓɛ: ‹Ɨmɨ, nakɛgʉ Kilisito, luki limoti, Kunzi etikoku ndɨ kambwa kakɨ.›

Mombukwana muko nɔ ikaga mbʉnya muko. Luki limoti, wai-dakɨ mbʉnya muko nɨnɔ a ka kpɔlɔ kakɨ, anamʉkana, ogwaga magyagya kʉgbɛ ko bulya lɨyʉ ka mbʉnya muko. Kinili, na na magyagya ɓɨsɨnɨ-sɨnɨ mbɨya wanʉ.
Okwononi ɓɛ ɨbɨba kakɨ oɓoɓoyi, nɨyɔ kamɨ agbʉwa.»
«Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ otukyiku kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ ukitogi ɓatʉ ɓasɨ. Nɨnɔ wa lɨtɔmbʉ a ɨyɨ mʉtʉ wa lɨtɔmbʉ aka, anzɨnaga ko bulya makpʉmʉka ma lɨtɔmbʉ. Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ otukyiku kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ ukitogi ɓatʉ ɓasɨ.
Atʉmbʉlaga makpʉmʉka nɨmɔ ɨna ndɨ na nɨmɔ ʉkana ndɨ. Luki limoti, mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kaɓɨnɨkyanagɨgʉ nɨlɔ ikaga kaɓɨkya.
Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ abaɨlyaga lɨkpʉmʉka kakɨ, oɓinikyononi ɓɛ Kunzi nɨ lɨngʉnʉ.
Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ Kunzi atikoku, aɓɨkyaga lɨkpʉmʉka ko Kunzi, kyɛ Kunzi atumisogo na Lɨmbɛngɨ kakɨ ɓɨɗɛ.
Baba apagatʉ Mikakɨ, asilyoni makpʉmʉka masɨ.
Nɨnɔ aɓɨnɨkyana Miki, a na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ. Nɨnɔ akya kaɓɨnɨkyana, kinisonigʉ ndɛkɛ na ɔɓɨlɨ yi nɨnɔ. Luki limoti, ngbʉta ko Kunzi ika kʉgʉ kakɨ.»
Nɨyɔ Yeso iba ɓɛ Ɓafalisayɔ ɓukonini ɓɛ ɨsaɓʉ ka ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ akobwa kʉgbɛ, na akauɓotisa ɓambanzʉ kakɨtaga Yuani,
(a ɓɛyɔ, kɛgʉ Yeso mombukwana-dakɨ nɔ uɓotisaga ndɨ, luki limoti, ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ.)
Atʉkya ndɨ ka Yudɛa, ɨga ɓata ka Galilaya.
Kadwɛ kʉ ɓɛyɔ, akwanana ndɨ kakɨtaga pisi ka Samalia.
Adwɛ kʉwa ndɨ ka gʉɗʉ ɓemoti wa Samalia, nɨnɔ ina ɓɛ Sikali, ɓuwobi no tiko nɨyɔ Yakɔbɔ apá ndɨ mikakɨ ɓɛyɔ ka Yɛzɛfʉ.
Lɨkɔ ka Yakɔbɔ a ndɨ kʉ ɓɛyɔ. Yeso a ndɨ nɨ hupini na lɨgʉndʉ ɓɨdapaɗa, ika kʉwa ndɨ ka kpɔlɔ wa lɨkɔ. A ndɨ banda mɔnɨ ka mʉsɨkatʉ.
Waɓasamalia odoku ndɨ katʉga liɓo, Yeso aɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Yɛ ma, imusanɔ ɓaka mino liɓo.»
Ko ngbingo yi nɨnɔ, ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓa ndɨ nɨ ɓogoni koluwo malɨlɨ ka gʉɗʉ.
Waɓasamalia aka ndɨ na ɨyɨ ɓɛ: «Eze! Muyuda ɓɛyɔ wo mino yɨ, wakaɨkpʉnda kɛkʉnga ɨmɨ Waɓasamalia liɓo lɨkɨ?» (A ɓɛyɔ, Ɓayuda ɓakʉkananagɨgʉ ndɨ na Ɓasamalia.)
Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Wakamibo ɓi apɛpɛ nɨnɔ Kunzi apága, wiba ɓɛ wanɨ nɔ akaʉkʉnga liɓo, iba ɨwɛ nɔ wakungi ɓi. Winisono ɓi no liɓo nɨlɔ apága ɔɓɨlɨ.»
Muko yi nɨnɔ aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, wakɛgʉ no luki lɨtʉga liɓo na lɨkɔ
a lodu kʉgbɛ. Wakwanana kʉwa kainisono no liɓo li nɨlɔ la ɔɓɨlɨ lɔ lɨkɨ?
Tɨtosu ɓɛyɔ ka Yakɔbɔ nɔ atɨsɨlya ndɨ iɓusu lɨkɔ li nɨlɨ. Ɨyɨ ɓɨkpɛ nɔ omwaga ndɨ, iki ɓomikakɨ gʉtʉgʉ ɓambaza ka ɓanyama kakɨ aka. Wakaɨmɨna abɛ ɨwɛ nɔ wakitogi Yakɔbɔ?»
Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mʉtʉ wasɨ komwo liɓo li nɨlɨ, ɨmʉkanatʉ ɓanʉ ɓata mʉsasa.
Luki limoti, nɨnɔ omwo ndɛkɛ liɓo nɨlɔ ɨmɨ napá, kɨmʉkanɨgʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata mʉsasa gʉtʉgʉ iki yi aka. Liɓo li nɨlɔ ɨɨta ndɛkɛ kʉsɔ kakɨ lɨkpakpa nɨlɔ ika kopupisa liɓo la ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ.»
Muko nɔ aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, ipóku nɛkɨ liɓo li nɨlɔ, iba nakimukononitɔgʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata mʉsasa. Kʉwa wa gɔ wa, nakodukugʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata wanʉ katʉga liɓo.»
Yeso aka ndɨ na ɨyɨ ɓɛ: «Wɨnda kamokoku mbʉnyakʉ, modoku na ɨyɨ wanʉ.»
Muka nɔ asikisya ɓɛ: «Nakɛgʉ ɨmɨ na mʉlʉkʉ.» Yeso aka ndɨ na ɨyɨ ɓɛ: «Woɓikyi lɨngʉnʉ ɓɛ wakɛgʉ na mulʉkʉ,
kyɛ wa kʉwa na ɓovononi kuɓukumuti. Nɨnɔ ma na ɨyɨ mbɨya wanʉ, kɛgʉ mbʉnyakʉ. Woɓikyi lɨngʉnʉ.»
Kʉwa wa, muka aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, nakaɨna abɛ wa mugyalandʉ.
Ɓotitosu ɓabibisaga ndɨ Kunzi kʉgʉ wa ngʉpa yi nɨyɨ. Iɓunu, maɓɨkyaga ɓɛ pa nɨyɔ okwononi mino kabibisa Kunzi nɨ Yelusalɛma aka.»
Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ma, ɨɓɨnɨkyana nɔ. Ngbingo odokuto nɨnɔ makɨndɨgʉ ndɛkɛ mino kabibiso Baba kʉgʉ wa ngʉpa yi nɨyɨ ikanɨ ka Yelusalɛma.
Iɓunu Ɓasamalia, mabibisogo Kunzi nɨ makɛgʉ kamibo. Iɓusu Ɓayuda, tabibisogo nɨ tanamibo, kyɛ muhukuso akotukyoku ka Ɓayuda.
Luki limoti, ngbingo akodoku, na itulyonini, nɨnɔ ɓatʉ ɓi nɨɓɔ ɓabibisogo mino Kunzi ka lɨngʉnʉ, ɓabibisogo ndɛkɛ Baba ka Lɨmbɛngɨ na lɨngʉnʉ. A ɓɛyɔ, Baba ʉkɨsaga inguo ya ɓatʉ ɓi nɨɓɔ.
Kunzi nɨ Lɨmbɛngɨ, na ɓatʉ ɓi nɨɓɔ ɓabibisogo, okwononi ɓɛ ɓabibisi ka Lɨmbɛngɨ na ka lɨngʉnʉ.»
Muko nɔ aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Nakaiba ɓɨnza ambɛ Masiya akodoku (nɨnɔ ɓamakaga ɓɛ Kilisito). Wa odoku ndɛkɛ mino, ɨyɨ, atɨtʉmbʉlyagatʉ masɨ.»
Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ nɨ Kilisito, nɨnɔ nakaʉnzɨnɨlya nɔ.»

Ko ngbingo yi nɨnɔ aka nɔ, ɓaɓɨɓya ka Yeso ɓigoku ndɨ. Ɓa ndɨ kombomboyo kyɛ ɓamɨna ndɨ Yeso kanzɨna na muko. Wɨna sɛ, gʉtʉgʉ mʉtʉ ɓemoti aka kamuusagʉ ndɨ muko nɔ ɓɛ: «Wakakɨsa ɨkɨ?» Ikanɨ kamuusa Yeso ɓɛ: «Wakanzɨna na ɨyɨ ko bulya ɨkɨ?»
Muko nɔ asa kʉwa ndɨ mbɨkɛ wa, ɨga, utumbulyogoku ndɨ ɓambanzʉ ɓɛ:
«Donuku kamɨna! Alʉkʉ ɓemoti a kʉ, etumbulyogi masɨ nɨmɔ nogyoni. Kɛgʉ sɛ ɓanʉ ɓi Kilisito nɨnɔ?»
Ɓatʉkya kʉwa ndɨ wa, ɓɨnda kamɨna Yeso.
Kʉwa wa, ɓaɓɨɓya ɓɨtatanaga ndɨ na Yeso ɓɛ: «Muwonisilo, lyalya mbɛyɨ!»
Luki limoti, ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ, nakalya malɨlɨ nɨmɔ makɛgʉ iɓunu kaibo.»
Ɓaɓɨɓya ɓapʉnga kʉwa ndɨ kauusono ɓɛ: «Mʉtʉ ɓemoti sɛ kʉwa nɔ oduku kapá malɨlɨ?»
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Malɨlɨ kamɨ nɨ kagya sɨpananɨsɔ ka nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ na kotulyosa ligubo nɨlɔ ɛpá ndɨ.

Makaɓɨkyagɨgʉ mbɛyɨ iɓunu ɓamombukwono-donu ɓɛ: ‹Osikoni ɓatɨmba ɓakwanganya ngbinga mubuulyo masɔlɔ ɨtʉlyana?› Luki limoti, ɨmɨ nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, wikweni, winoni ɓotiko. Malɨlɨ ongotini, a kʉwa kakʉnga kobuulyo.
Mʉtʉ nɨnɔ akobuulyo inisonini ɨyɨ na mʉkalya kakɨ, a kʉwa kamʉmʉla masɔlɔ ko bulya ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ. Kʉwa wa, mʉkʉkʉna na mʉtʉ mubuulyo ɓogwa magyagya ɨɓʉ ɓasɨ ɓaɓa.
A ɓɛyɔ, a lɨngʉnʉ nɨlɔ ɓaɓɨkyaga ɓɛ: ‹Mʉtʉ ɓemoti nɔ akʉnaga, wagɔgɔ obuulyo.›
Ɨmɨ, namʉtɨka ndɨ kobuulyo ko tiko nɨyɔ makagyagʉ ndɨ mino ligubo. Ɓatʉ ɓagɔgɔ ɓɔ ɓɨkɔ ndɨ mino ɓungu ɓɨkya, iɓunu modoku kobuulya masɔlɔ ma ligubo kaɓʉ aka.»
Ɓasamalia ɓakpʉ ka gʉɗʉ yi nɨnɔ ɓaɓɨnɨkyana ndɨ Yeso, kyɛ muko yi nɨnɔ ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Etumbulyogi masɨ nɨmɔ nogyoni.»
Kinili, nɨyɔ Ɓasamalia ɓodoku ndɨ ɓuwobi na ɨyɨ, ɓɨtatanaga ndɨ na ɨyɨ ɓɛ kogonitɔgʉ mbɛyɨ. Agya ndɨ ɓata wa masyɛ maɓa.
Ɓatʉ ɓagɔgɔ ɓudingi kʉgbɛ ɓabaɨlya ndɨ ko bulya lɨkpʉmʉka nɨlɔ a ndɨ kaɓɨkya.
Ɓaɓɨkyaga kʉwa ndɨ muko nɔ ɓɛ: «Takoɓinikyonigʉ ko bulya nɨlɔ aka lɔ watiɓikyi, luki limoti, kyɛ timukyonili kʉwa nɨ iɓusu aka. Tibini lɨngʉnʉ ambɛ ɨyɨ nɔ a Muhukuso wa ɔɓɨlɨ.»
Nɨyɔ Yeso agya masyɛ maɓa ka mugi mi nɨmɔ, atʉkya ndɨ wa, aga ka Galilaya.
Ɨyɨ Yeso mombukwana-dakɨ ɓɨkpɛ aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mugyalandʉ kɛgʉ na ɨbɨba kʉ kaɓʉ.»
Nɨyɔ osila ka Galilaya, ɓatʉ ɓi nɨɓɔ kʉ ɓatɨlya ndɨ, kyɛ ɓɨndatʉ ndɨ gɔnɨ ɨɓʉ ka yɨnga wa Pasɨka ka Yelusalɛma, ɓɨna ndɨ masɨ nɨmɔ Yeso agya ndɨ kʉ.
Yeso ɨga kʉwa ndɨ ka Kana kʉ ka Galilaya, kʉ oyikosa ndɨ mino liɓo kaɨɨta vinya. Kʉ ɓɛyɔ, a ndɨ na ngama ɓemoti ka ɓasʉda nɨnɔ mikakɨ mʉlʉkʉ yi a ndɨ no koloɓu kʉ ka Kapɛlɛnaumu.
Nɨyɔ ʉkana ndɨ ɓɛ Yeso otukyiniku ɓi ka Yudɛa, a kʉwa ka Galilaya, odoku ndɨ kamɨna. Ɨtatanaga kʉwa ndɨ na ɨyɨ ɓɛ ɨndɨ nɔ ɓaka ka Kapɛlɛnaumu kahukusilyo mikakɨ nɨnɔ a ndɨ ɓuwobi kosisa lɨmbɛngɨ.
Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Makini ndɛkɛ iɓunu mokingyosi na makpʉmʉka mʉmbanga-mbanga aka, makaɓɨnɨkyanɨgʉ ndɛkɛ gʉtʉgʉ iki yi aka.»
Ngama yi nɨnɔ asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, taganɔ ɓaka kʉ kamɨ kanɨ miki kanodokigʉ.»
Yeso aka ndɨ na ɨyɨ ɓɛ: «Wɨga, miki oukini.»
Alʉkʉ nɔ ʉkana ndɨ nɨlɔ Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ, ɨga.
Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ a mbɛyɨ ndɨ mino ko pisi aka, ɓabangana na ɓagya-ligubo kakɨ, ɓaɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Miki oukini.»
Kʉwa wa, umuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ouki ɓi ngbinga tino?» Ɓasikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ouki ɓi isyeiku ɓi, na saa-saɓa ya mʉsɨkatʉ.»
Baba nɔ ibo kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ o ɓi ko ngbingo nɨnɔ aka nɔ Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ mino ɓɛ: «Miki oukini.» Kʉwa wa, ngama nɔ na ndaɓʉ kakɨ yasɨ ɓaɓɨnɨkyana ndɨ Yeso.
Nɨlɔ a ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka lɨmbanga la yɨɓa nɨlɔ Yeso agya ndɨ. Agya ndɨ ngbingo yi nɨnɔ igoku ndɨ mino ka Galilaya kotukyoku ka Yudɛa.
Kʉwa wa, Ɓayuda ɓa ndɨ no dumo ka Yelusalɛma, Yeso aga ndɨ kʉ gɔ kʉ.

Kʉ ɓɛyɔ, a ndɨ na ziwa ɓemoti ɓuwobi na mupumi ma gʉɗʉ yi nɨnɔ, nɨmɔ ɓalɨkyaga ɓɛ «mupumi ka Ɓakɔndɔlɔ». Ziwa yi nɨnɔ a ndɨ na ɓangbangba kuɓukumuti ka ɓakpɔlɔ-kpɔlɔ ɓi. Ɓamakaga ndɨ ziwa yi nɨnɔ ka Libelenia ɓɛ «Bɛtɛsaida».
Kʉsɔ wa ɓangbangba ɓi nɨɓayɔ, ɓatʉ ɓa ɓokoloɓu ɓudingi ɓikaga ndɨ ɓakanganana wa. Ikaga ndɨ na ɓatʉ ɓa ɓokoloɓu ɓaya mamɔmɔ, nɨɓɔ ɓa dɨlɨ na ɓazɛgɛsɨ. [Ɓikaga ndɨ kaɓʉnda ɓɛ liɓo obunzikoni,
a ɓɛyɔ, malaika ka Mombukwono-dosu osyogoku ndɨ ɓongbingo ɓemoti-ɓemoti ka ziwa yi nɨnɔ kabunzo. Mʉtʉ wo koloɓu wa mambwa nɨnɔ osyaga ndɨ ko liɓo li nɨlɔ kanɨ malaika obunzini, aʉkaga ndɨ lɨngʉnʉ.]
Luga kaɓʉ, a ndɨ na alʉkʉ ɓemoti nɨnɔ a ndɨ no koloɓu ka ɓyanga ɓatɛkɛɓɛ ɓasaa na ɓʉgɨna.
Nɨyɔ Yeso amɨna wakanga, ʉkana ndɨ gɔnɨ ɓɛ a ndɨ no koloɓu ka masyɛ mudingi, amuusa kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Watʉ kapa kahʉka?»
Alʉkʉ nɔ asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, nakikogigʉ na mʉmbanzʉ nɨnɔ esiso ko liɓo ngbingo yi nɨnɔ ɓobunzaga mino. Nɨyɔ nakɨngɨlaga ambɛ nosyi kʉ ɓɛyɔ, mʉtʉ wagɔgɔ osyo kambwa kamɨ.»
Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Wamaga, va kalagba kakʉ na wakpakyana!»
Wa aka wa, alʉkʉ nɔ ahʉka ndɨ. Ava kalagba kakɨ, apʉnga ndɨ kakpakyana.
Lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɔ igyonosa ndɨ ka Lɨsyɛ la kimumbiso.
Ɓayuda ɓaɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ahʉka ndɨ nɔ ɓɛ: «Lɨsyɛ li nɨlɨ, a Lɨsyɛ la kimumbiso. Wakakwananɨgʉ kabɨnɨka kalagba kakʉ.»
Usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ehukusi nɔ eɓikyi ɓɛ: ‹Va kalagba kakʉ, wakpakyana.›»
Ɓamuusa kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mʉtʉ tino nɔ uɓikyi ɓi ɓɛ: ‹Va kalagba kakʉ, wakpakyana?›»
Luki limoti, alʉkʉ yi nɨnɔ ahʉka ndɨ nɔ kɛgʉ ndɨ kamibo Yeso. A ɓɛyɔ, Yeso a ndɨ nɨ olimikogini ka ambaza nɨnɔ a ndɨ wa.
Kumbuso yi, Yeso atakanya ka Ndaɓʉ ko Kunzi, aɓɨkya ɓɛ: «A ɓɛyɔ, mbɨya wanʉ wohukini. Wakogyonitɔgʉ ɓata ɓʉnyɛ, kyɛ wigyogyisa kʉwa kakɨtaga ɓɛyɔ wo ɓi mino.»
Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ɨnda ndɨ kaʉɓɨkya Ɓayuda ɓɛ Yeso nɔ ahukusa ndɨ.
Kinili, ɓapʉnga ndɨ mino kakɨsa kagyogyiso Yeso, kyɛ ahukusa ndɨ mʉmbanzʉ ka Lɨsyɛ la kimumbiso.
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Baba agyaga ligubo ɓongbinga ɓasɨ, ɨmɨ na gɔnɨ mino aka ɓilubi.»

Nɨyɔ Ɓayuda ɓʉkana mʉnzɨna mi nɨmɔ, ɓidukulaga kʉwa ndɨ ɓata kakɨsa Yeso ɓɨvaka-vaka kamwɔ. Ɓa ndɨ kagya ɓɛyɔ, kɛgʉ asɨ kyɛ Yeso ɨnaga ndɨ Lɨsyɛ la kimumbiso payaya, luki limoti, kyɛ aɓɨkyaga ndɨ gɔnɨ ɓɛ Kunzi nɨ abakɨ ɓɨkpɛ, na ɨyɨ mombukwana-dakɨ a mʉɗɔngɔnɨ no Kunzi.

Yeso uɓikyoku ndɨ ɓata Ɓayuda ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, Miki kakwananɨgʉ kagya luki na mʉtamanagɨ kakɨ, kiki nɨlɔ aka lɔ ɨnaga na Abakɨ. Nɨlɔ Baba agyaga, Miki agya mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛgɛyɔ.
A ɓɛyɔ, Baba apagatʉ Miki, awonisilaga masɨ nɨmɔ agyaga. Awonisila kʉwa ndɛkɛ ɓata makpʉmʉka mudingi-dingi kʉgbɛ, kʉwa wa gɔ wa, nɔkʉ amʉdɨka ndɛkɛ ɓɨdɛ.
Mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ Baba ubililisogo mino ɓamanda, ʉpá ɔɓɨlɨ, ka lɨngʉnʉ, Miki ʉpága ɓatʉ nɨɓɔ ɨyɨ ʉbaɨlyaga ɓɛgɛyɔ.
Na gɔnɨ, Baba kakɔgɨgʉ ngbanga ka mʉmbanzʉ, luki limoti, apóni ndɨ Miki ngu yi nɨyɔ yasɨ,
kyɛ ɓatʉ ɓasɨ ɓaɓangɨ Miki mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ɓaɓangaga mino Baba. Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ kaɓangagɨgʉ Miki, kaɓangagɨgʉ gɔnɨ Baba nɨnɔ atikoku.

A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ ʉkanaga lɨkpʉmʉka kamɨ, na aɓɨnɨkyana nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ, a na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ. Ɓakamakyɨgʉ ndɛkɛ ka mʉngɨmbɔ, luki limoti, otukyoni ka kukwakʉ akɨtaga ka ɔɓɨlɨ.
A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, ngbingo akodoku, na a kʉwa gɔnɨ wakɨtʉlyana aka, nɨnɔ ɓamanda ɓʉkana ndɛkɛ mino lɨyʉ ko Miko-Kunzi. Na nɨɓɔ ɓʉkana ndɛkɛ, ɓinisanatʉ na ɔɓɨlɨ.
A ɓɛyɔ, mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ɔɓɨlɨ wasɨ o mino ka maɓɔkʉ ka Baba, apá gɔnɨ Miki, ɔɓɨlɨ yi nɨnɔ wasɨ a kʉwa gɔnɨ ka maɓɔkʉ ko Miki.
Apá ndɨ Miki ngu yɨkɔ ɓangbanga, kyɛ a Mika-mʉmbanzʉ.
Makombomboyonitɔgʉ, kyɛ ngbingo akodoku nɨnɔ ɓamanda ɓayasɨ nɨɓayɔ a ka ɓambʉkʉ ɓʉkana ndɛkɛ mino lɨyʉ ko Mika-mʉmbanzʉ,
ɓopupogoku. Nɨɓɔ ɓagyaga ndɨ ɓʉnza, ɓopupoku ndɛkɛ kainisoniso na ɔɓɨlɨ, luki limoti, nɨɓɔ ɓagyaga ndɨ ɓʉnyɛ, ɓopupoku ndɛkɛ kaingyo ka mʉngɨmbɔ.»

Yeso omotiloku ndɨ ɓɛ: «Nakakwananɨgʉ kagya luki gʉtʉgʉ limoti aka no ngu kamɨ. Nakɔgɔ ngbanga kaɓyɛnɛnɛ na nɨlɔ baba ɛkpamyaga, na ngbanga kamɨ ikaga wongbingbili kyɛ nakakɨsagɨgʉ kagya sɨpananɨsɔ kamɨ, luki limoti, nɨsɔ ka mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ etikoku.»
Yeso omotiloku ndɨ kʉwa ɓɛ: «Nakika dɛmʉ kamɨ mombukwana-dakɨ yi, ɓʉdɛmʉ kamɨ kɛgʉ ɓa lɨngʉnʉ.
Luki limoti, mʉtʉ wagɔ nɔ a dɛmʉ kamɨ, na nakaiba ambɛ ɓʉdɛmʉ kakɨ kʉgʉ kamɨ a ɓa lɨngʉnʉ.
Iɓunu, mʉtɨkatʉ ndɨ ɓatʉtʉmbwa kʉ ka Yuani, na ɓʉdɛmʉ kakɨ kʉgʉ kamɨ a ndɨ ɓa lɨngʉnʉ.
Ɨmɨ, nakɛgʉ na nza ya ɓʉdɛmʉ ka mʉmbanzʉ. Luki limoti, nakaɓɨkya ɓɛyɔ kyɛ winisononi na muhukuso.
Yuani a ndɨ abɛ tala mʉtʉna na mʉnzɛ. Iɓunu, mabaɨlya ndɨ kazananɨlyaga ɓʉngbanganya ɓi nɨɓɔ ko ngbinga mʉkɛɗɛ aka.
Luki limoti, ɓʉdɛmʉ kamɨ a ɓudingi kʉgbɛ kakɨtaga nɨɓɔ ka Yuani. A ɓɛyɔ, mogubo nɨmɔ Baba ɛpá ndɨ ɓɛ nagyagɨ, imu mɔ nagyaga, na imu mɔ epupilyaga ɓʉdɛmʉ na kowonisilo ɓɛ Baba nɔ etikoku ndɨ.
Na Baba nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ a gɔnɨ dɛmʉ kamɨ. Makanukonigʉ ndɛkɛ lɨyʉ kakɨ ikanɨ kamɨna.
Makoɓuulyogigʉ lɨkpʉmʉka kakɨ ka mambɛngɨ kunu, kyɛ makaɓɨnɨkyanagʉ mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ atikoku ndɨ.
Mikaga ɓakiɗukufo ɓiguɓu katangʉlaga Moɓiso Motu, kyɛ matamanaga ɓɛ makiko kagya ɓɛyɔ, makwanana kainiso na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ. Luki limoti, dɛmʉ kamɨ nɨ Moɓiso mi nɨmɔ gɔnɨ mɔ.
Luki limoti, makya kodoku kʉ kamɨ kainiso na ɔɓɨlɨ.
Nakakɨsagɨgʉ ɨbɨba kotukyoku ka ɓambanzʉ,
luki limoti, nakamumibo: kʉsɔ kunu, makɛgʉ na sɨpananɨsɔ ko Kunzi.
Ɨmɨ, nodoku ndɨ ko lino ka Baba, luki limoti, makapagɨgʉ kɛtɨlya. Mʉtʉ wagɔ kodoku ko lino kakɨ ɓɨkpɛ, matɨlyatʉ ndɛkɛ.
Makwanana kaɓɨnɨkyana lɨkɨ? Iɓunu mapánanaga ɨbɨba luga kunu aka nɨ makɛgʉ kakɨsa nɨyɔ otukyogoku ko Kunzi yɨkaka.
Makotomononitɔgʉ ɓɛ ɨmɨ, namʉpɨ́lyagatʉ ndɛkɛ ɓangbanga ka Baba. Musa nɨnɔ mobisa ndɨ baya kunu kʉgʉ kakɨ, ɨyɨ nɔ amʉpɨ́lyaga ndɛkɛ.
A ɓɛyɔ, makaɓɨnɨkyana ndɨ Musa, iba meɓinikyononi gɔnɨ, kyɛ ɨyɨ, okpikagatʉ ndɨ mongoni kʉgʉ kamɨ.
Luki limoti, kika nɨ makɛgʉ kaɓɨnɨkyana moɓiso kakɨ, makwanana kʉwa kaɓɨnɨkyana mʉnzɨna kamɨ lɨkɨ?»
Kumbuso yi, Yeso azaba ndɨ kʉsyakʉ wa ibombu ya Galilaya nɨyɔ ɓalɨkyaga gɔnɨ ɓɛ Tibelia.
Ambaza mudingi ka ɓambanzʉ a ndɨ kaɓɨɓya. A ɓɛyɔ, ɓambanzʉ ɓi nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ kaɨna mokingyosi mʉmbanga-mbanga nɨmɔ Yeso agyaga ndɨ kauhukuso ɓatʉ ɓa ɓokoloɓu.
Yeso aɗaka ndɨ ka ngʉpa, ɓikanana ndɨ kʉ ɓɛyɔ pa imoti na ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ.
Wɨna sɛ, yɨnga ka Ɓayuda nɨyɔ ɓalɨkyaga ɓɛ Pasɨka a kʉwa ndɨ ɓuwobi.
Yeso ɨkwɛ ndɨ, amɨna ambaza mudingi nɨ anadulyoku. Aɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ Filipi ɓɛ: «Taluwoku mukati yanɨ kaulyoliso na ɨyɨ ɓatʉ ɓi nɨɓa?»
Aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛyɔ ko bulya yɨkɨngɨla Filipi aka. A ɓɛyɔ, Yeso atʉ ndɨ kaiba kambwa aka ɓɛ agya ɓʉ.
Filipi asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Gʉtʉgʉ takaluwo mukati ma ɓambuma ɓamɨya ɓaɓa
, kɨtʉlyanigʉ ka ɓatʉ ɓasɨ.»
Ɓemoti luga ka ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓɛyɔ ka Andɨlɨa nɨnɔ a ndɨ mamakɨ Simoni-Pɛtɛlɛ, aɓɨkya ɓɛ:
«Miki ɓemoti atʉ na mukati kuɓukumuti ma saili wanʉ
pa imoti na ɓosi ɓaɓa. Luki limoti, malɨlɨ mi nɨmɔ kɛgʉ gʉtʉgʉ luki aka ka ɓambanzʉ ɓudingi ɓɛnɛ.»
Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Hulikisoni ɓambanzʉ ɓasɨ.» Tɔnɨtɔ a ndɨ tidingi wa ɓɨgbɛsɛɛɛ, ɓikonono kʉwa ndɨ. Ɓalʉkʉ ɓa ndɨ banda ɓɛlɔfʉ kuɓukumuti.
Yeso ava kʉwa ndɨ mukati, nɨyɔ abibiso Kunzi, ʉgbananɨlyaga ndɨ ɓambanzʉ nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ wa. Agya ndɨ na ɓosi ɓɛgɛyɔ, ʉpága mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ɓa ndɨ mino kapa.
Nɨyɔ ɓikutaga ndɨ, Yeso ʉɓɨkya ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓɛ: «Mumuloni ɓodongbu nɨɓayɔ osikoni kyɛ koputikononitɔgʉ.»
Ɓamʉmʉla kʉwa ndɨ, ɓotumisa mʉmbɨ tɛkɛɓɛ na mɨɓa na ɓodongbu ɓaya mukati kuɓukumuti ɓaya saili nɨɓayɔ asɨkana ndɨ.
Nɨyɔ ɓambanzʉ ɓɨna ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka lɨmbanga nɨlɔ Yeso agya ndɨ lɔ, ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɨngbanganya ɓɛ: «Alʉkʉ yi nɨmʉna a lɨngʉnʉ mugyalandʉ nɨnɔ a ndɨ kakwanana kodoku ka ɔɓɨlɨ.»
Yeso andʉnga kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ ɓakodoku kagwi ka mapʉpʉ ɓɛ kyɛ iki ngama, atʉkya ndɨ, aga ɓata mʉkaka ka ngʉpa.
Nɨyɔ ɓʉgɔgɔ ogwo, ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓɨnda ndɨ ka mutili ma ibombu.
Ɓaɗaka kʉwa ndɨ ka ɨngbɔlɔ, ɓapʉnga kazaba, ɓaga misa ka Kapɛlɛnaumu. Biti a ndɨ nɨ olipyini, Yeso kɛgʉ ndɨ mudoku kaʉtakanya.
Ovivi a ndɨ wapʉ, mʉɓaka anokotukosa liɓo la ibombu ɓɨgbɨya-gbɨya.
Nɨyɔ ɓaɓɨɓya ɓagya ɓakilɔmɛtɛlɛ banda kuɓukumuti ikanɨ maɗɨya kʉgʉ wo liɓo, ɓamɨna ndɨ Yeso nɨ anukpuɗoku. A ndɨ kakpakyana kʉgʉ wo liɓo ɓɨpapapa. Ɓogwa ndɨ ombombo kʉgbɛ.
Luki limoti, Yeso ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ nɔ, makoɓongonitɔgʉ.»
Ɓaɓɨɓya ɓa kʉwa ndɨ kapa ɓɛ ɓavɨ, luki limoti, ɨngbɔlɔ ɨfʉma ndɨ ɓɨgala kubi ka pa nɨyɔ ɓa ndɨ mino kaɨnda.

Na ɓʉgalo ɓi, ambaza ka ɓambanzʉ nɨɓɔ ɓotigala ndɨ kʉsyakʉ wagɔgɔ wa ibombu ɓatamana ndɨ ɓɛ ɨngbɔlɔ o ɓi wa imoti aka. Yeso kaɗakagʉ ndɨ pa imoti na ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ, luki limoti, ɓaɓɨɓya ɓɨnda ndɨ asɨ ɨɓʉ aka.
Wɨna sɛ, mangbɔlɔ magɔgɔ otukyoku ndɨ ka gʉɗʉ wa Tibelia. Mangbɔlɔ mi nɨmɔ a kʉwa ndɨ nɨ osilini ɓuwobi na pa nɨyɔ ɓambanzʉ ɓalya ndɨ mino mukati, kumbuso Mombukwono-dosu kabibiso Kunzi.
Ambaza ka ɓambanzʉ ɨna ndɨ ɓɛ Yeso ikanɨ ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓakɛgʉ ɓata wa. Ɓaɗaka kʉwa ndɨ ka mangbɔlɔ, ɓaga kakɨsa ka Kapɛlɛnaumu.
Nɨyɔ ɓatʉ ɓi nɨɓɔ ɓadwɛ, ɓatokonyoku ndɨ Yeso kʉsyakʉ wagɔgɔ wa ibombu, ɓamuusa ɓɛ: «Muwonisilo, wosiliku wanʉ ngbingo tino?»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, makɛgʉ kɛkɨsa asɨ kyɛ mini ɓi makpʉmʉka mʉmbanga-mbanga, luki limoti kyɛ malyi ɓi mukati, mikutogo ɓɨkpɛkɛɗɛ-kpɛkɛɗɛ.

Makogyonitɔgʉ ligubo ko bulya malɨlɨ nɨmɔ apʉtɨkanaga. Luki limoti, gyoni ka nɨmɔ olipyogo, apá ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ. Mika-mʉmbanzʉ amʉpátʉ ndɛkɛ malɨlɨ mi nɨmɔ. A ɓɛyɔ, Baba nɨnɔ a Kunzi ɓɨkpɛ owonisila ndɨ ɓɨngbanganya ɓɛ ɨyɨ nɔ atikoku.»
Ɓamuusa kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Takwanana kagya ɓʉ kotulyoso mogubo nɨmɔ Kunzi apaga?»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ligubo nɨlɔ Kunzi akapa ɓɛ gyoni nɨlɨ: iɓinikyononi ɨmɨ yi nɨnɔ ɓetikoku ndɨ.»
Ɓaɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Lɨkpʉmʉka lɨmbanga tino lɔ wakwanana katɨgyɨlya kyɛ tʉɓɨnɨkyanɨ? Wakagya luki tino?
Ɓotitosu ɓalyatʉ ndɨ malɨlɨ nɨmɔ ɓalɨkyaga ɓɛ mana kʉ ka ɨsa. Mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ikpikaga ndɨ mino ka Moɓiso Motu ɓɛ: ‹Kunzi ʉpá ndɨ mukati nɨmɔ otukyoku ndɨ kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ.›»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, kɛgʉ Musa nɔ amʉpá ndɨ mukati nɨmɔ otukyoku ndɨ kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ. Luki limoti, Baba nɔ apága mukati ma lɨngʉnʉ nɨmɔ otukyoku kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ.
A ɓɛyɔ, mukati ko Kunzi, a nɨmɔ osyogoku kotukyoku kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ, apá ɔɓɨlɨ ka lɨtɔmbʉ.»
Ɓaɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, tɨpága masyɛ masɨ mukati mi nɨmɔ aka mɔ.»
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ nɨ mukati nɨmɔ apága ɔɓɨlɨ. Mʉmbanzʉ kodoku kʉ kamɨ, ɛɓɨnɨkyana, kɨmʉkanɨgʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata nza na mʉsasa gʉtʉgʉ iki yi aka.
Luki limoti, namʉɓɨkyatʉ ndɨ ambɛ: wɨna sɛ, mɛmɨnatʉ ndɨ kanɨ makoɓinikyonigʉ.
Mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ baba ɛpá, odokuto kʉ kamɨ. Kedulyoku, nakakpumyigʉ ndɛkɛ.
A ɓɛyɔ, nakotukyokugʉ ndɨ kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ kagya sɨpananɨsɔ kamɨ, luki limoti nɨsɔ ka nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ.
Na sɨpananɨsɔ ka nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ a ɓɛ nakaɓungusogonitɔgʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka ka nɨɓɔ epóku, luki limoti nupupisatʉ ɓasɨ ka ɓambʉkʉ ka lɨsyɛ la muliɓo.
A ɓɛyɔ, sɨpananɨsɔ ka baba a ɓɛ mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ amɨna Miki, aɓɨnɨkyana, inisoni na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ. Ɨmɨ, napupisatʉ ndɛkɛ ka mbʉkʉ ka lɨsyɛ la muliɓo.»
Ɓayuda ɓapʉnga kʉwa ndɨ kanzɨnzɨnya Yeso kyɛ aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ ɨyɨ nɨ mukati nɨmɔ osyoku kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ.
Ɓa ndɨ kaɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Kɛgʉ mbɛyɨ Yeso mʉ? Mika Yɛzɛfʉ? Takamibigʉ mbɛyɨ abakɨ na amakɨ? Akwanana pɨyɛ kaɓɨkya ɓata lɨkɨ ɓɛ osyoku kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ?»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Wosoni kaɨnzɨnzɨnya luga kunu.
Mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kakwananɨgʉ kodoku kʉ kamɨ, kiki nɨ Baba nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ aka nɔ alutiniku. Ɨmɨ, napupisatʉ ndɛkɛ mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ka mbʉkʉ ka lɨsyɛ la muliɓo.
Ikpikaga ka moɓiso ka ɓogyalandʉ ɓɛ: ‹Kunzi ʉtɨwa ndɛkɛ ɓambanzʉ ɓasɨ.› Mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ amʉkana Baba, aɓyɛ mʉtʉʉ kakɨ, odokuto kʉ kamɨ.
Kɛgʉ na mʉtʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka nɨnɔ aminoni Baba, kiki nɨnɔ aka nɔ otukyoku ko Kunzi, ɨyɨ nɔ aminoni Baba.
A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, nɨnɔ ɛɓɨnɨkyana, a na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ.
Ɨmɨ nɨ mukati nɨmɔ apága ɔɓɨlɨ.
Ɓotitonu ɓalyatʉ ndɨ mana ka ɨsa, gʉtʉgʉ ɓɛyɔ, ɓolumwaga ndɨ.
Luki limoti, mukati mi nɨmɔ osyoku kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ nɨma. Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ alya, kokwigʉ ndɛkɛ.
Ɨmɨ nɨ mukati ma ɔɓɨlɨ nɨmɔ osyoku kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ. Mʉmbanzʉ kalya, ika ndɛkɛ na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ. Mukati mi nɨmɔ napá ndɛkɛ ambɛ ɓambanzʉ ɓinisoni na ɔɓɨlɨ nɨ nzʉyɨ kamɨ.»
Kʉwa wa, Ɓayuda ɓapʉnga ndɨ ɓoɗongoso luga kaɓʉ, ɓanaɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Alʉkʉ yi nɨmʉ akwanana pɨyɛ katɨpá nzʉyɨ kakɨ ɓɛ talyɨ lɨkɨ?»
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, makolyi nzʉyɨ ko Mika-mʉmbanzʉ, momwo ɓangʉ kakɨ, makikigʉ na ɔɓɨlɨ kʉsɔ kunu.
Mʉmbanzʉ kalya nzʉyɨ kamɨ, omwo ɓangʉ kamɨ, ika na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ. Napupisa ndɛkɛ ka mbʉkʉ ka lɨsyɛ la muliɓo.
A ɓɛyɔ, nzʉyɨ kamɨ a malɨlɨ ma lɨngʉnʉ, ɓangʉ kamɨ a luki limwo la lɨngʉnʉ.
Mʉtʉ nɨnɔ alyaga nzʉyɨ kamɨ, omwa ɓangʉ kamɨ, ikaga kʉsɔ kamɨ na ɨmɨ kʉsɔ kakɨ.
Baba nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ a na ɔɓɨlɨ, ɨmɨ, na na ɔɓɨlɨ ko ngu kakɨ. A ɓɛgɛyɔ, mʉmbanzʉ nɨnɔ ɛlya, inisa na ɔɓɨlɨ pisi kʉ kamɨ.
Mukati mi nɨma otukyoku kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ. Kɛgʉ abɛ nɨmɔ ɓotitonu ɓalya ndɨ, gʉtʉgʉ ɓɛyɔ, ɓokwaga ndɨ aka. Luki limoti, nɨnɔ alya mukati mi nɨma, ika na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ.»
Yeso anzɨna ndɨ mʉnzɨna mi nɨmana ka Kapɛlɛnaumu nɨ akapá mʉtʉʉ ka ndaɓʉ ya malʉmba.
Nɨyɔ ɓʉkana mʉnzɨna ka Yeso ɓɛyɔ, ɓudingi ɓa ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ aka ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mʉnzina mi nɨmana a mʉmbanga kʉgbɛ, wanɨ nɔ akwanana kapa kaʉkana?»
Yeso andʉnga ndɨ ɓɛ ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓakaɨnzɨnzɨnya ko bulya mʉnzɨna mi nɨmɔ. Kinili, umuusa kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɨ amutulisito mambɛngɨ?
Kika nɨ a ɓɛyɔ, ika kʉwa lɨkɨ nɨ maminini Mika-mʉmbanzʉ kaɗaka ɓata ka pa nɨyɔ a ndɨ mino kambwa?
Lɨmbɛngɨ ko Kunzi lɔ apága ɔɓɨlɨ. Nzʉyɨ kakwananɨgʉ kagya luki. Mʉnzɨna nɨmɔ namʉɓɨkya ndɨ mɔ a mutumo no ngu ya lɨmbɛngɨ, na imu mɔ apága ɔɓɨlɨ.
Luki limoti, ɓambanzʉ ɓemoti-ɓemoti luga kunu ɓakɛgʉ kaɓɨnɨkyana. A ɓɛyɔ, Yeso ibagatʉ ndɨ katʉkya ka ɓʉndɛlɨ aka ɓɛ atʉ na nɨɓɔ ɓakaɓɨnɨkyanagɨgʉ ndɨ na nɨnɔ agaba ndɛkɛ.»
Omotiloku ndɨ ɓɛ: «Kinili, namuɓikyi ambɛ: ‹Kɛgʉ na mʉmbanzʉ nɨnɔ akwanana kodoku kʉ kamɨ kiki nɨ baba aka nɔ ahukwilyini pisi.›»
Katʉkya ko ngbingo yi nɨnɔ aka nɔ, ɓudingi ɓa ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓasa ndɨ, ɓakakpakyanagɨgʉ ndɨ ɓata na ɨɓʉ.
Yeso umuusa kʉwa ndɨ ɓaɓɨɓya tɛkɛɓɛ na ɓaɓa ɓɛ: «Yɛgʉ iɓunu, ma kʉwa gɔnɨ iɓunu kapa kɛsa?»
Simoni-Pɛtɛlɛ asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, tɨnda ɓata ka wanɨ? Ɨwɛ wa na mʉnzɨna nɨmɔ apága ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ.
Iɓusu, takaɓɨnɨkyana, takaiba ambɛ ɨwɛ nɨ Mʉtʉ Wotu nɨnɔ Kunzi atikoku ndɨ.»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Kɛgʉ mbɛyɨ ɨmɨ aka nɔ namʉpʉnaga ndɨ iɓunu ɓasɨ tɛkɛɓɛ na ɓaɓa? Luki limoti, ɓemoti luga kunu a mumuyoniso!»
Yeso a ndɨ kanzɨna ko bulya ka Yuda nɨnɔ a ndɨ mika Simoni Isikalioti. A ɓɛyɔ, Yuda nɔ a ndɨ kagaba, gʉtʉgʉ ɓɛyɔ a ndɨ mino ɓemoti ka ɓaɓɨɓya tɛkɛɓɛ na ɓaɓa yɔ.
Kumbuso yi, Yeso alingya ndɨ Galilaya wasɨ. A ɓɛyɔ, kɛgʉ ndɨ kapa kalingyo Yudɛa kyɛ ɓangama ka Ɓayuda ɓa ndɨ kakɨsa kamwisiso.
Wɨna sɛ, yɨnga ɓemoti ka Ɓayuda nɨnɔ ɓamakaga ndɨ ɓɛ yɨnga wa Ɓangbangba
a kʉwa ndɨ ɓuwobi.
Ɓamamakɨ Yeso ɓaɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Tɨtʉkyɨlya iɓusu wanʉ, waga ka Yudɛa iba ɓaɓɨɓya kakʉ nɨɓɔ kʉ ɓɨnɨtɔ gɔnɨ ɨɓʉ nɨlɔ wika kagya.
Kɛgʉ na mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka nɨnɔ agyaga lɨkpʉmʉka ko dikiɗi, nɨ a sɛ kakɨsa kaimibisisoko ɓɨngbanganya. Kika nɨ wakagya makpʉmʉka mʉmbanga-mbanga, wiwonisa nɛkɨ ka ɓambanzʉ ɓasɨ.»
A ɓɛyɔ, gʉtʉgʉ ɓamamakɨ ɓɨkpɛ ɓakɛgʉ ndɨ kaɓɨnɨkyana.
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ kamɨ wanza kanitulyonigʉ mbɛyɨ. Luki limoti, nɨnɔ kunu ikaga ɨyɨ asɨ wanza aka ɓongbinga ɓasɨ.
Ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ ɓakakwananɨgʉ kamʉmʉya iɓunu. Luki limoti, ɓɛmʉyatʉ ɨmɨ kyɛ na dɛmʉ kaʉɓɨkyaga yɨgya kaɓʉ yanyɛ.
Windoni iɓunu ka yɨnga. Nakɛgʉ mino ɨmɨ kaɨnda kyɛ ngbingo kamɨ kɛgʉ mbɛyɨ wakɨtʉlyana.»
Nɨyɔ aɓɨkya ɓɛyɔ, asɨkana ndɨ ɨyɨ ka Galilaya.
Nɨyɔ ɓamamakɨ ɓɨnda ndɨ ka yɨnga, Yeso ɨnda ndɨ gɔnɨ ɨyɨ ɓɨpɛlɛ nɨ ɓambanzʉ ɓakibigʉ.
Kʉwa wa, ɓangama ka Ɓayuda ɓapʉnga ndɨ kakɨsa ɓɨvaka-vaka, ɓanuusogo ɓɛ: «Alʉkʉ yi nɨnɔ a yanɨ?»
Kʉsɔ wa ambaza kʉ, ɓambanzʉ ɓa ndɨ kaɨnzɨnzɨnya yakpʉ kʉgʉ ka Yeso. Ɓatʉ ɓagɔ ɓa ndɨ kaɓɨkya ɓɛ: «A mʉtʉ wanza.» Ɓatʉ ɓɔ ɓɛ: «Haaa, akauluta ɓambanzʉ ko pisi yanyɛ.»
Luki limoti, kɛgʉ na mʉtʉ ɓemoti nɨnɔ aɓɨkyaga ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka ɓɨngbanganya, kyɛ ɓʉɓangaga ndɨ ɓangama ka Ɓayuda.
Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ dumo a kʉwa ndɨ mino ɓɨkɔkpwɔ, Yeso aga ndɨ ka Ndaɓʉ ko Kunzi, apʉnga kapá mʉtɨwɨ.
Ɓayuda ɓombombaya ndɨ, ɓanaɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Alʉkʉ mʉna apʉnya mbɛyɨ na yimibo yanɨ? Wɨna sɛ, kɨndagʉ gʉtʉgʉ ndɨ ka ɨkɔlɔ ɓɛgɛyɔ.»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mʉtɨwɨ nɨmɔ ɨmɨ napága, kikogigʉ makamɨ, luki limoti, ikaga ma ko Kunzi nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ.
Mʉmbanzʉ kika wakɨtʉlya kagya nɨlɔ Kunzi apaga, iba pisi ka mʉtʉʉ mi nɨmɔ ɓɛ akotukyoku ka Baba ikanɨ kamɨ ɓɨkpɛ.
Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ anzɨnaga ko lina kakɨ ɓɨkpɛ, akɨsaga ɨbɨba kakɨ aka mombukwana-dakɨ yi. Luki limoti, nɨnɔ akɨsaga ɨbɨba ka nɨnɔ atikoku ndɨ, aɓɨkyaga lɨngʉnʉ nɨ kʉɓɔɓɔkʉ kɛgʉ kʉsɔ kakɨ.
Musa kamʉpágʉ mbɛyɨ ndɨ mʉtʉʉ? Luki limoti, mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kɛgʉ kaɓyɛ mʉtʉʉ mi nɨmɔ. Mbɨya wanʉ, ko bulya ɨkɨ yɔ mo mino kakɨsa kemwisiso?»
Ambaza asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Wa na lɨmbɛngɨ la ɓʉnyɛ! Wanɨ mbɛyɨ nɔ akakɨsa kaumwisiso?»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Nagya ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka lɨmbanga limoti aka, amudikisa ndɨ iɓunu ɓasɨ nɔkʉ ɓɨdɛ.
Iɓunu mʉkɔgɔ ɓomiki gʉtʉgʉ ka Lɨsyɛ la kimumbiso aka kyɛ Musa amʉpá ndɨ mʉtʉʉ kagyaga ɓɛyɔ. Ka lɨngʉnʉ, kodokugʉ ndɨ ka Musa, luki limoti, ka ɓotitonu.
Kika nɛkɨ nɨ ɓʉkɔgɔtʉ ɓomiki ka Lɨsyɛ la kimumbiso, a ko bulya yiɓuulya mʉtʉʉ ka Musa. Ko bulya ɨkɨ sɛ kʉwa yɔ mambɛngɨ o mino kamʉkandɨkana wa nauhukusi mino mʉmbanzʉ ka Lɨsyɛ la kimumbiso?
Makokogonitɔgʉ mʉkɔmbʉ kaɓyɛnɛnɛ na nɨyɔ mɨnaga no miso aka, luki limoti, kogoni ka ɓungbingbili.»
Ɓatʉ ɓagɔgɔ ɓa Yelusalɛma ɓa ndɨ kaɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Kɛgʉ mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ɓakakɨsa kamwisiso nɨmʉ?
Wɨna sɛ, akanzɨna ɓɨngbanganya kambwa ka ɓambanzʉ na ɓakɛgʉ gʉtʉgʉ kaɓukyo aka. Ɓangama ɓibito nɛkɨ ɓi lɨngʉnʉ ɓɛ ɨyɨ nɨ Masiya?
Takaiba ambɛ mʉtʉ yi nɨmʉna apʉnya yanɨ. Luki limoti, ngbingo yi nɨnɔ Masiya odoku ndɛkɛ mino, mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kibigʉ ndɛkɛ ɓɛ apʉnya yanɨ.»

Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ Yeso a kʉwa ndɨ mino kapá mʉtɨwɨ ka Ndaɓʉ ko Kunzi, aɓɨkya ndɨ na lɨyʉ lapʉ ɓɛ: «Matʉ kemibo ɓɨnza na mibatʉ kʉ no mino kapʉnya? Nakodokugʉ ndɨ ko ngu kamɨ ɓɨkpɛ, luki limoti, nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ aɓɨkyaga ɨyɨ asɨ lɨngʉnʉ aka. Iɓunu, makamibigʉ.
Ɨmɨ, namibatʉ kyɛ notukyoku ndɨ kʉ kakɨ, ɨyɨ nɔ etikoku.»
Ɓakɨsa kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ ɓagwi Yeso lɨkɨ, luki limoti, mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kakwananagʉ ndɨ kagwi, kyɛ ngbingo kakɨ kɛgʉ mbɛyɨ ndɨ wakɨtʉlyana.
Kʉsɔ wa ambaza, ɓambanzʉ ɓaɓɨnɨkyana ndɨ, ɓaɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ Masiya odoku ndɛkɛ mino, agyatʉ ndɛkɛ gɔnɨ ɨyɨ makpʉmʉka mʉmbanga-mbanga makpʉ kakɨtaga alʉkʉ yi nɨmʉ?»
Ɓafalisayɔ ɓʉmʉkana ndɨ ɓambanzʉ nɨ ɓanɨnzɨnzɨnya ko bulya ka Yeso ka ambaza kʉ. Kʉwa wa, ɓokumu-kumu na Ɓafalisayɔ ɓʉtɨka ndɨ ɓazamʉ kagwi.
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓatʉ nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ wa ɓɛ: «Na mbɛyɨ ɓata pa imoti na iɓunu ko ngbinga mʉkɛɗɛ. Kumbuso yi, nɨgatʉ katakanya nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ.
Mɛkɨsatʉ ndɛkɛ ɓɨvaka-vaka, luki limoti, makɛmɨnɨgʉ. Makakwananɨgʉ ndɛkɛ kosila kʉ niko mino.»
Ɓayuda ɓuusana ndɨ luga kaɓʉ ɓɛ: «A sɛ kʉwa kaɨnda yanɨ, nɨyɔ takakwananɨgʉ mino kamɨna? A sɛ kapa kaɨnda ka Ɓayuda ɓi nɨɓɔ ɓa ɓumisikono luga ka Ɓagiliki na kaʉpá Ɓagiliki mʉtɨwɨ kakɨ?
Atiɓikyi ɓi ɓɛ: ‹Mɛkɨsatʉ ndɛkɛ ɓɨvaka-vaka, luki limoti, makɛmɨnɨgʉ. Makakwananɨgʉ ndɛkɛ kosila kʉ niko mino.› Isi ya mʉnzɨna mi nɨmɔ nɨ ɨkɨ?»
Lɨsyɛ la muliɓo la yɨnga yi nɨnɔ a ndɨ lɨsyɛ lidingi kʉgbɛ. Lɨsyɛ li nɨlɔ, Yeso amaga ndɨ ɓɨgba, aɓɨkya na lɨyʉ lapʉ ɓɛ: «Mʉmbanzʉ kika na mʉsasa, oduku komwo liɓo kʉnʉ no mino.
Ka mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ, ika ndɛkɛ mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ Moɓiso Motu aɓɨkyaga mino ɓɛ: ‹Mambɛngɨ mo moɓo mudingi-dingi nɨmɔ apága ɔɓɨlɨ akɨka ndɛkɛ katʉkya ka lɨmbɛngɨ ka mʉtʉ nɨnɔ ɛɓɨnɨkyana.›»
Yeso a ndɨ kanzɨna ɓɛyɔ ko bulya Lɨmbɛngɨ ko Kunzi nɨlɔ ɓatʉ ɓi nɨɓɔ ɓaɓɨnɨkyana ɓika ndɛkɛ nolu. A ɓɛyɔ, Lɨmbɛngɨ li nɨlɔ kɛgʉ mbɛyɨ ndɨ lidoku, kyɛ Kunzi a ndɨ nɨ kanapígʉ Yeso ɨbɨba.
Nɨyɔ ɓambanzʉ ɓagɔgɔ luga wa ambaza ɓʉkana mino mʉnzɨna mi nɨmɔ, ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ aka Mugyalandʉ nɨnɔ ɓawanyaga ndɨ!»
Ɓagɔgɔ ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Masiya nɔ!» Luki limoti, ɓagɔgɔ ɓata ɓɛ: «Ambɛ, Masiya akwananatʉ kotukyoku ka Galilaya?
Moɓiso Motu kaɓɨkyagɨgʉ mbɛyɨ ɓɛ Masiya ɨɓʉkʉta ndɛkɛ ka lɨvananza ka ngama Daudi na ka Bɛtɛlɛhɛmʉ, mugi nɨmɔ Daudi a ndɨ mino?»
Kʉwa wa, ambaza ɨgbananaga ndɨ ko bulya ka Yeso.
Ɓatʉ ɓagɔgɔ luga kaɓʉ ɓa ndɨ kapa kagwi, luki limoti, mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kavɨlagʉ ndɨ.
Kumbuso yi, ɓazamʉ nɨɓɔ ɓokumu-kumu na Ɓafalisayɔ ɓʉtɨka ndɨ, ɓigoku. Ɓumuusa kʉwa ndɨ ɓazamʉ ɓɛ: «Ko bulya ɨkɨ yɔ makodukugʉ mino na Yeso?»
Ɓusikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨmbanga! Takanamukonigʉ ndɛkɛ mʉmbanzʉ ananzɨna abɛ alʉkʉ yi nɨnɔ kʉ!»
Ɓafalisayɔ ɓumuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ambɛ, mogulyini kʉwa gɔnɨ iɓunu ka kʉɓɔɓɔkʉ kwi nɨkwɔ?
Atʉ mbɛyɨ na mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka luga kusu ka ɓangama ikanɨ ka Ɓafalisayɔ nɨnɔ aɓɨnɨkyana?
Luki limoti, ɓatʉ ɓi nɨɓɔ ɓakibigʉ mʉtʉʉ ka Musa. Ɓovoni ndɨ ligbongoni.»
Nikodimo a ndɨ ɓemoti ka Ɓafalisayɔ nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ wa. Ɨyɨ nɔ odoku ndɨ kamɨna Yeso kambwa, ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ:
«Mʉtʉʉ kusu, akɔgɔtʉ mʉkɔmbʉ ka mʉmbanzʉ nɨ ɓakanomukonigʉ ikanɨ ɓakanibigʉ ɓɛ ogyi ɓi ɨkɨ?»
Luki limoti, ɓasikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Wa kʉwa ɨwɛ mʉtʉ wa Galilaya gɔnɨ? Kpɨma mbɛyɨ Moɓiso Motu ɓɨnza ikanɨ wɨnatʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓɛ mugyalandʉ ɓemoti opupatʉ ndɛkɛ ka Galilaya.»
Kumbuso yi, ɨɓʉ ɓasɨ ɓɨganana ndɨ ka ɓakʉkaɓʉ.
Luki limoti, Yeso aga ndɨ ɨyɨ ka Ngʉpa ya Mizeituni.
Ɓʉgala ɓi na ɓʉsɔɓɨ ɓiɓo, ɨga ndɨ ɓata ka Ndaɓʉ ko Kunzi. Ɓambanzʉ ɓasɨ ɓakpuɗoku ndɨ. Iko, apʉnga ndɨ kaʉpá mʉtɨwɨ.
Ɓowonisilo ɓa mʉtʉʉ na Ɓafalisayɔ ɓodoku kʉwa ndɨ wa na muko ɓemoti nɨnɔ ɓagwi ndɨ na mʉlʉkʉ. Ɓamomosa ndɨ kambwa ka ɓambanzʉ ɓɨgbʉ,
ɓaɓɨkya Yeso ɓɛ: «Muwonisilo, ɓagwi muko yi nɨmʉ na mʉlʉkʉ mbɨya wa.
Kaɓyɛnɛnɛ na mʉtʉʉ kusu, Musa atɨkpamya ndɨ kaʉmwɔgɔ inguo ya ɓoko ɓi nɨɓa na matamʉ. Ɨwɛ, wa sɛ kʉwa kaɓɨkya ɓʉ?»
Ɓa ndɨ kaɓɨkya ɓɛyɔ ko bulya yɨkɨngɨla Yeso, kyɛ ɓa ndɨ kakɨsa kasʉngʉlya. Luki limoti, Yeso odidika ndɨ, apʉnga kokpiko na kpɛngbɛ ka lɨtɔmbʉ.
Nɨyɔ ɓisisilaga ndɨ mino kamuusogo, Yeso ananʉkana ndɨ, ʉɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Mʉtʉ nɨnɔ kanogyigʉ ndɛkɛ ɨyɨ ɓʉnyɛ luga kunu, apʉngɨ nɨ ɨyɨ kamaka lɨtalʉ la mambwa.»
Kumbuso yi, odidika ndɨ ɓata, apʉnga ɓata kokpiko ka lɨtɔmbʉ.

Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ ɓʉkana mino ɓɛyɔ, ɓapʉnga ndɨ katʉkya yɨkaka-yɨkaka kaɨpʉnga na ɓambɔkʉ. Yeso otigolo mʉkaka aka wa ɨɓʉ na muko yi nɨnɔ wa a mbɛyɨ ndɨ ɓata mino wakamaga kambwa ka ɓatʉ nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ wa.
Kʉwa wa, Yeso amaga ɓata ndɨ, amuuso muko nɔ ɓɛ: «Yɛ ma, ɓatʉ nɨɓɔ ɓusungulyi ɓa yanɨ? Kɛgʉ nɛkɨ na mʉmbanzʉ nɨnɔ ubisi na mʉkɔmbʉ?»
Asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka Mombukwono-dosu.» Yeso aka na ɨyɨ ɓɛ: «Ɛɛɛ, nakubisigʉ ɨmɨ na mʉkɔmbʉ ɓɛgɛyɔ. Waganɔ, luki limoti, wakigilyonitɔgʉ ɓata kagya ɓʉnyɛ.»]
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ɓata ndɨ ɓambanzʉ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ nɨ ɓʉngbanganya ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ. Mʉmbanzʉ kɛɓɨɓya kakpakyanɨgʉ ndɛkɛ ko biti, luki limoti, inisona ndɛkɛ na ɓʉngbanganya ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ.»
Ɓafalisayɔ ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨwɛ nɔ wa dɛmʉ kakʉ ka mombukwana-dakɨ yi. Ɓʉdɛmʉ kakʉ kɛgʉ nɛkɨ ɓa lɨngʉnʉ.»

Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Gʉtʉgʉ nakika dɛmʉ kamɨ mombukwana-dakɨ yi, ɓʉdɛmʉ kamɨ a ɓa lɨngʉnʉ, kyɛ nakaiba ambɛ napʉnya yanɨ na nakaɨnda yanɨ. Luki limoti, iɓunu, makɛgʉ kaiba ɓɛ napʉnya yanɨ ikanɨ nakaɨnda yanɨ.
Iɓunu, makɔgɔ lɨkpʉmʉka kaɓyɛnɛnɛ na tamanaga ka ɓambanzʉ. Luki limoti, ɨmɨ, nakakɔgɨgʉ lɨkpʉmʉka ka mʉmbanzʉ.
Na gʉtʉgʉ nakakɔ lɨkpʉmʉka ka mʉmbanzʉ, ika ka ɓungbingbili aka kyɛ nakɛgʉ mʉkaka. Luki limoti, ta pa imoti na Baba nɨnɔ etikoku.
Wɨna sɛ, ka mʉtʉʉ kunu, ɓokpikatʉ ndɨ ɓɛ ɓʉdɛmʉ ka ɓatʉ ɓaɓa ɓɔ ikaga ɓa lɨngʉnʉ.
Na dɛmʉ kamɨ mombukwana-dakɨ yi. Baba nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ a gɔnɨ dɛmʉ kamɨ.»
Ɓafalisayɔ ɓamuusa kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Abakʉ a sɛ kʉwa yanɨ?» Yeso aka ndɨ na ɨɓʉ ɓɛ: «Makemibigʉ na makamibigʉ Baba. Makemiba ndɨ, iba mamibatʉ gɔnɨ Baba.»

Yeso a ndɨ kanzɨna ɓɛyɔ ngbingo yi nɨnɔ a ndɨ mino ka Ndaɓʉ ko Kunzi. A ndɨ ka kpɔlɔ wa kpokoyo nɨnɔ ɓaɗɨkɨtaga mino apɛpɛ. Mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kagwigʉ ndɨ kyɛ ngbingo kakɨ kɛgʉ ndɨ wakɨtʉlyana.
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ɓata ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ, nogoni ɨmɨ. Mɛkɨsatʉ ɓanʉ, luki limoti, mokwo ndɛkɛ ka ɓʉnyɛ kunu. Makakwananɨgʉ kosila kʉ no mino kaɨnda.»
Ɓayuda ɓuusana ndɨ luga kaɓʉ ɓɛ: «A sɛ kʉwa kaɨnda kaibongiso, kyɛ akaɓɨkya ɓɛ: ‹Makakwananɨgʉ kosila kʉ no mino kaɨnda?›»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Iɓunu, ma ɓatʉ ɓa wasɨ wanʉ, luki limoti, ɨmɨ, na mʉtʉ wa kʉgʉ. Iɓunu, ma ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ yi nɨmʉ, luki limoti, ɨmɨ, nakɛgʉ mʉtʉ wa ɔɓɨlɨ yi nɨmʉ.
Kinili, namuɓikyi ɓi ambɛ mokwaga ndɛkɛ ka ɓʉnyɛ kunu. A ɓɛyɔ, makoɓinikyoni ɓɛ ɨmɨ nɨ, ‹Natʉ›, mokwaga ndɛkɛ ka ɓʉnyɛ kunu aka.»
Ɓamuusa kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨwɛ mbɛyɨ nɨ wanɨ ɓɨkpɛ?» Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ nɨ nɨnɔ namʉɓɨkya ndɨ katʉkya ka mʉpʉnganagɨ.
Na na makpʉmʉka makpʉ kamʉɓɨkya na kamubiso mino na mʉngɨmbɔ. Luki limoti, naɓɨkyaga ka ɔɓɨlɨ nɨlɔ aka lɔ nʉkana ndɨ na nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ. Ɨyɨ, aɓɨkyaga lɨngʉnʉ.»
Ɓakɛgʉ ndɨ kaiba ɓɛ a ndɨ kaʉnzɨnɨlya ko bulya ka Abakɨ.

Yeso ʉɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ maɗokisa ndɛkɛ mino Mika-mʉmbanzʉ, miba kʉwa ndɛkɛ ɓɛ ɨmɨ nɨ ‹Natʉ›. Miba ɓɛ nakagyagɨgʉ luki gʉtʉgʉ limoti aka ka sɨpananɨsɔ kamɨ, luki limoti, naɓɨkyaga nɨlɔ aka lɔ Baba ewonisila ndɨ.
Nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ a pa imoti na ɨmɨ. Kɛsagʉ ndɨ mʉkaka, kyɛ nagyaga ɓongbinga ɓasɨ nɨlɔ aka lɔ aɓosogo.»
Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ Yeso a ndɨ mino kanzɨna ɓɛyɔ, ɓambanzʉ ɓakpʉ ɓaɓɨnɨkyana ndɨ.
Yeso ʉɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ Ɓayuda nɨɓɔ ɓaɓɨnɨkyana ndɨ ɓɛ: «Makiko kaɓyɛ mʉnzɨna kamɨ ɓɨnza, miko ka lɨngʉnʉ ɓaɓɨɓya kamɨ.
Miba ndɛkɛ lɨngʉnʉ, na lɨngʉnʉ amʉkʉlaga.»
Ɓasikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ta lɨvananza ka Abalahamʉ, mʉmbanzʉ katibisagʉ iɓusu ɓusunzu gʉtʉgʉ lɨsyɛ limoti aka. Wakatɨɓɨkya lɨkɨ ɓɛ takʉlɨkanagatʉ ndɛkɛ?»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ agyaga ɓʉnyɛ a musunzu wa ɓʉnyɛ.
Musunzu kikogigʉ ɓongbinga ɓasɨ ka lɨvananza. Luki limoti, miki ikaga ɨyɨ mino ka ɓongbinga ɓasɨ.
Kika nɛkɨ nɨ Miki amukulogini, mika kʉwa ndɛkɛ ɓʉkʉlɨkanaga lɨngʉnʉ.
Nakaiba ambɛ ma lɨvananza ka Abalahamʉ. Luki limoti, makakɨsa kemwisiso, kyɛ makɛgʉ kabaɨlya mʉnzɨna kamɨ.
Ɨmɨ, nakaɓɨkya nɨlɔ nɨna ndɨ ka Baba. Iɓunu, makagya nɨlɔ mʉkana ndɨ na obonu.»
Ɓasikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Obosu nɨ Abalahamʉ.» Yeso aka ndɨ na ɨɓʉ ɓɛ: «Makiko ɓi ka lɨngʉnʉ ɓomika Abalahamʉ, makwanano ɓi kagya mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ Abalahamʉ agyaga ndɨ mino.
Luki limoti, mbɨya wanʉ makakɨsa kemwisiso. Wɨna sɛ, Abalahamʉ kagyagʉ ndɨ ɨyɨ inguo ya lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɔ. Ɨmɨ namʉɓɨkyaga ndɨ lɨngʉnʉ nɨlɔ nʉkana ndɨ kotukyoku ko Kunzi.
Iɓunu, makagya mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ obonu wagɔgɔ agyaga ndɨ mino.» Ɓasikisya ndɨ Yeso ɓɛ: «Takɛgʉ ɓomiki ɓa ɓʉɗanda. Obosu ɓemoti nɨ Kunzi aka.»
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Kunzi kiko ɓi Obonu, makwananatʉ ɓi kɛpa. A ɓɛyɔ, ɨmɨ nopupa ndɨ ko Kunzi, nodoku sɛ kʉwa. Nakodokugʉ ndɨ ko ngu kamɨ ɓɨkpɛ, luki limoti, ɨyɨ nɔ etikoku ndɨ.
Ko bulya ɨkɨ yɔ makɛgʉ mino kotombisyo lɨkpʉmʉka nɨlɔ nakamʉɓɨkya? A kyɛ makakwananɨgʉ kaʉkana mʉnzɨna kamɨ.

Obonu nɨ mumuyoniso, mapaga kagya nɨlɔ aka lɔ aɓosilogo. Ɨyɨ, a ndɨ mʉmwɔ ɓambanzʉ katʉkya ka mʉpʉnganagɨ. Gʉtʉgʉ lɨsyɛ limoti aka kanomogigʉ ndɛkɛ ka lɨngʉnʉ, kyɛ lɨngʉnʉ kɛgʉ kʉsɔ kakɨ. Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ aɓʉkʉlaga mino ɓɔngɔ, anzɨnaga ɨyɨ asɨ mʉɗɔngɔnɨ aka, kyɛ ikaga ɨyɨ ɓɛyɔ aka yɔ katʉkya ndɨ ka ɓʉndɛlɨ. A ɓɛyɔ, a mʉtʉ wa kʉɓɔɓɔkʉ na mombukwana kʉɓɔɓɔkʉ.
Luki limoti, ɨmɨ naɓɨkyaga lɨngʉnʉ, kinili, makɛɓɨnɨkyanagɨgʉ.
Mʉtʉ tino luga kunu nɔ akwanana kaɓɨkya ɓɨngbanganya ɓɛ nagya ndɨ ɓʉnyɛ? Kika nɛkɨ nɨ nakaɓɨkya lɨngʉnʉ, ko bulya ɨkɨ yɔ makɛgʉ mino kɛɓɨnɨkyana?
Mʉtʉ ko Kunzi ʉkanaga lɨkpʉmʉka ko Kunzi. Kika nɨ iɓunu makʉkanagɨgʉ, a kyɛ makɛgʉ ɓatʉ ko Kunzi.»
Kʉwa wa, Ɓayuda ɓasikisya ndɨ Yeso ɓɛ: «Iɓusu, toɓikyito ɓi lɨngʉnʉ ambɛ wa Musamalia, na gɔnɨ ɓɛ wa na lɨmbɛngɨ la ɓʉnyɛ.»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Nakɛgʉ ɨmɨ na lɨmbɛngɨ la ɓʉnyɛ, luki limoti, naɓangagatʉ Baba. Iɓunu, makɛɓangagɨgʉ ɨmɨ.
Ɨmɨ, nakakɨsagɨgʉ ɨbɨba kamɨ, luki limoti, Kunzi nɔ ɛkɨsɨlyaga ɨmɨ. Ɨyɨ nɔ akɔgɔ mʉngɨmbɔ.
A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, mʉmbanzʉ koɓuulyogo mʉnzɨna kamɨ, kokwigʉ ndɛkɛ.»

Ɓayuda ɓaɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mbɨya wanʉ, tibini sɛ kʉwa lɨngʉnʉ ambɛ wa na lɨmbɛngɨ la ɓʉnyɛ! Abalahamʉ okwoni ndɨ, ɓogyalandʉ ɓokwogo gɔnɨ. Ɨwɛ, wakaɓɨkya ɓɛ: ‹Mʉmbanzʉ koɓuulyogo mʉnzɨna kamɨ, kokwigʉ ndɛkɛ.›
Wa mʉtʉ wa ɨbɨba kakɨtaga obosu ɓɛyɔ ka Abalahamʉ? Okwoni ndɨ, ɓogyalandʉ ɓokwogo gɔnɨ. Wa mbɛyɨ kaɨva abɛ wanɨ?»
Yeso osikisya ɓɛ: «Nakɨbɨba ɨmɨ mombukwana-dakɨ yi, ɨbɨba yi nɨyɔ kikigʉ na ɨzangɨya. Baba yi nɨnɔ maɓɨkyaga ɓɛ Obonu, ɨyɨ nɔ ɛbɨbaga ɨmɨ.
Luki limoti, makamibigʉ. Ɨmɨ, namibatʉ ɨmɨ. Nakaɓɨkyo ɓi ambɛ nakamibigʉ, niko ɓi mʉtʉ waɓɔngɔ abɛ iɓunu. Luki limoti, namibatʉ na noɓuulyagatʉ mʉnzɨna kakɨ.
Obonu ɓɛyɔ ka Abalahamʉ ogwaga ndɨ magyagya ka tamanaga kaɨna lɨsyɛ nɨlɔ nodoku ndɛkɛ mino. A lɨngʉnʉ, ɨnatʉ ndɨ, otumo na magyagya ɓɨɗɛ.»
Ɓayuda ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Wakanotulyosigʉ ɓyanga ɓatɛkɛɓɛ kuɓukumuti. Wamɨna kʉwa ndɨ Abalahamʉ yi lɨkɨ?»
Yeso aka na ɨɓʉ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, kambwa Abalahamʉ kaɨɓʉkʉta, ɨmɨ ‹natʉ.›»
Ɓapʉnaga kʉwa ndɨ matamʉ kamakaga nomu. Luki limoti, Yeso ɨsʉma ndɨ, opupo ka Ndaɓʉ ko Kunzi.
Lɨsyɛ limoti, Yeso a ndɨ kakpakyana ko pisi, amɨna alʉkʉ ɓemoti nɨnɔ ɨɓʉkʉta ndɨ nɨ kɨnagɨgʉ.
Ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓamuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Muwonisilo, ko bulya ɨkɨ yɔ alʉkʉ yi nɨmʉ ɨɓʉkʉta ndɨ mino nɨ kɨnagɨgʉ? A ndɨ ko bulya ɓʉnyɛ kakɨ ikanɨ nɨɓɔ ka ɓaɓʉkʉta kakɨ?»
Yeso osikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Kɛgʉ ko bulya ɓʉnyɛ kakɨ ikanɨ nɨɓɔ ka ɓaɓʉkʉta kakɨ. Luki limoti, a ɓɛyɔ kyɛ ligubo ko Kunzi inisoni pisi kʉ kakɨ.
Okwononi tagyɨ ligubo ka nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ na lɨsyɛ. Biti a kʉwa kolipyo, ngbingo yi nɨnɔ mʉmbanzʉ kakwananɨgʉ mino kagya ligubo.
Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ na mbɛyɨ mino ka ɔɓɨlɨ, ɨmɨ nɨ ɓʉngbanganya ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ.»
Nɨyɔ Yeso anzɨna ɓɛyɔ, aɓakya ndɨ ɓotikito ka lɨtɔmbʉ, opula kʉwa, agboɗya noɓu alʉkʉ yi nɨnɔ ko miso.
Aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Wɨnda kaɨsʉkʉsa miso ka ziwa wa Siloamu.» Isi ya «Siloamu» nɨ «Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ɓatiki». Alʉkʉ nɔ aga ndɨ ɓɛyɔ aka yɔ, ɨsʉkʉsa miso, igoku kʉwa nɨ anɨna ɓɨngbanganya.
Ɓapɨmbanɨ kakɨ na ɓatʉ nɨɓɔ ɓamɨnaga ndɨ kambwa kaɨkʉkʉngya, ɓuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Kɛgʉ mbɛyɨ alʉkʉ nɨnɔ ikaga ndɨ wakiko kaɨkʉkʉngya nɨmʉ?»
Ɓagɔgɔ ɓosikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Iyo, ɨyɨ aka nɔ.» Ɓagɔgɔ ɓata ɓɛ: «Kalɨ, kɛgʉ ɨyɨ, ɓaɓyɛnɛnɛ na ɨyɨ.» Luki limoti, alʉkʉ nɔ aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ aka nɔ.»
Ɓamuusa kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Miso uhukwikoni ɓi lɨkɨ?»
Osikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Alʉkʉ nɨnɔ ɓamakaga ɓɛ Yeso opuli ɓi lɨtɔmbʉ, egboɗyo nolu ko miso, ɛɓɨkya ɓɛ: ‹Wɨnda kaɨsʉkʉsa ka Siloamu.› Nago ɓi, nogyoku ɓɛyɔ aka yɔ, napʉnga kaɨna.»
Ɓamuusa ɓata ndɨ ɓɛ: «Alʉkʉ yi nɨnɔ a yanɨ?» Usikisya ɓɛ: «Sibigʉ.»
Kʉwa wa, ɓɨnda ndɨ na alʉkʉ nɨnɔ ahʉka ndɨ nɔ kʉ ka Ɓafalisayɔ.
Wɨkwɛ sɛ a ndɨ Lɨsyɛ la kimumbiso lɔ Yeso opula ndɨ mino lɨtɔmbʉ, ahukusa alʉkʉ yi nɨnɔ.
Ɓafalisayɔ ɓamuusa ndɨ gɔnɨ alʉkʉ yi nɨnɔ ɓɛ igyonosa ndɨ lɨkɨ ɓɛ apʉngɨ kaɨna ɓɛyɔ? Uɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Egboɗya ndɨ lɨtɔmbʉ ko miso, nisukusoku, mbɨya wanʉ nakaɨna.»

Ɓafalisayɔ ɓagɔgɔ ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ kɛgʉ mʉtʉ ko Kunzi, kyɛ kɛgʉ kaɓanga Lɨsyɛ la kimumbiso.» Luki limoti, ɓagɔgɔ ɓata ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mʉtʉ wanyɛ akwanana pɨyɛ kagya makpʉmʉka mʉmbanga-mbanga ɓɛnɛ lɨkɨ?» Ɓafalisayɔ ɓɨgbananaga ndɨ luga kaɓʉ.
Ɓamuusa ɓata ndɨ alʉkʉ nɨnɔ ahʉka ndɨ nɔ ɓɛ: «Ɨwɛ, wakaɓɨkya ɓʉ kʉgʉ ka mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ uhukusi ɓi?» Osikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A mugyalandʉ.»
Luki limoti, ɓangama ka Ɓayuda ɓakaɓɨnɨkyanagʉ ndɨ ɓɛ alʉkʉ nɔ ɨɓʉkʉta ndɨ nɨ kɨnagɨgʉ, mbɨya wanʉ akaɨna ɓɨngbanganya. Ɓʉmaka kʉwa ndɨ ɓaɓʉkʉta kakɨ,
ɓumuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Alʉkʉ yi nɨmʉ a mikunu ɓɨkpɛ? Makaɓɨkya lɨngʉnʉ ɓɛ ɨɓʉkʉta ndɨ kanɨ kɨnagɨgʉ? Ɨkɨ yɔ igyonosi kʉwa ɓɛ apʉngɨ kaɨna?»
Ɓaɓʉkʉta kakɨ ɓosikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Takaiba ɓɛ a mikusu na ɨɓʉkʉta ndɨ nɨ kɨnagɨgʉ.
Luki limoti, takɛgʉ kaiba ɓɛyɔ opungi mino kaɨna ɓɛnɛ. Takɛgʉ gɔnɨ kamibo mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ahukusi. Takibigʉ iɓusu. Mumuusogono ɨyɨ aka, a kʉwa iti ya mʉmbanzʉ, akwanana kamʉtʉmbʉlyaga.»
Ɓaɓʉkʉta kakɨ ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛyɔ kyɛ ɓa ndɨ kaʉɓanga ɓangama ka Ɓayuda. A ɓɛyɔ, ɨɓʉ ɓangama ɓi nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ nɨ ɓukononini ɓɛ mʉmbanzʉ kaɓɨkya ɓɛ Yeso nɨ Masiya, ɓakpumyo lɨngʉnʉ ka ndaɓʉ ya malʉmba.
Kinili, ɓaɓʉkʉta ko miki yi nɨnɔ ɓosikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A iti ya mʉmbanzʉ, mumuusogoni ɨyɨ aka.»
Ka nganga ya yɨɓa, Ɓafalisayɔ ɓamaka ndɨ ɓata alʉkʉ yi nɨnɔ ahʉka ndɨ nɔ, ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɓɨkya lɨngʉnʉ kambwa ko Kunzi. Iɓusu, takaiba ambɛ mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ a mʉtʉ wanyɛ.»
Usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Nakibigʉ ikanɨ a mʉtʉ wanyɛ. Luki limoti, nakaiba lɨkpʉmʉka limoti aka: nakɨnagɨgʉ ndɨ, mbɨya wanʉ na kʉwa kaɨna.»
Ɓamuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ugyi ɓi ɓʉ? Uhukusi ɓi lɨkɨ?»
Usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Namutumbulyogini ɓi, luki limoti, makɛgʉ kaʉkana. Ko bulya ɨkɨ makapa ɓɛ namʉtʉmbʉlyagɨ ɓata? Ma kʉwa gɔnɨ iɓunu kapa kaɨɨta ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ?»
Ɓapʉnga kʉwa ndɨ katʉmbwa, ɓanaɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Sɨ ɨwɛ nɔ wa mʉɓɨɓya kakɨ! Luki limoti, ta iɓusu ɓaɓɨɓya ka Musa.
Iɓusu, tibagatʉ ɓɛ Kunzi akpʉmʉkaga ndɨ na Musa. Luki limoti, mʉtʉ yi nɨmʉ, takibigʉ ɓɛ apʉnya yanɨ!»
Alʉkʉ nɔ usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Lɨkpʉmʉka lɨmbanga a kyɛ makibigʉ ɓɛ apʉnya yanɨ, luki limoti, ehukusini!
Takaiba ɓɛ Kunzi kʉmʉkanagɨgʉ ɓatʉ ɓanyɛ. Luki limoti, amʉkanaga mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ aɓangaga, anagya sɨpananɨsɔ kakɨ.
Tanukonigʉ ndɛkɛ ɓɛ mʉmbanzʉ ahukusini mʉtʉ nɨnɔ ɨɓʉkʉta ndɨ nɨ kɨnagɨgʉ.
Alʉkʉ yi nɨmʉ kotukyiku ndɨ ko Kunzi, kakwananɨgʉ ɓi kagya luki.»
Ɓasikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Katʉkya wa aka wa ɓʉɓʉkʉta ndɨ mino, wikaga ɨwɛ ka ɓʉnyɛ aka. Wakapa kʉwa katɨtɨwa?» Kʉwa wa, ɓapupisa ndɨ kunzi wa ndaɓʉ ya malʉmba.
Yeso ʉkana ndɨ mongoni ɓɛ Ɓafalisayɔ ɓakpumyini alʉkʉ nɨnɔ ahʉka ndɨ nɔ. Ɨnda kʉwa ndɨ katakanya, amuusa ɓɛ: «Watʉ kaɓɨnɨkyana Mika-mʉmbanzʉ?»
Alʉkʉ nɔ asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, ɨɓɨkya ɓɛ ɨyɨ nɨ wanɨ iba naɓɨnɨkyanɨ.»
Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɛɛɛ, waminini, ɨyɨ nɔ wakanzɨna na ɨyɨ mbɨya wanʉ.»
Alʉkʉ nɔ aɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, noɓinikyonini.» Oɓuna ndɨ moli kambwa kakɨ.
Kumbuso yi, Yeso aka ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ, nodoku ndɨ ka ɔɓɨlɨ ko bulya mʉngɨmbɔ: okwononi ɓɛ ɓatʉ ɓa ɓokoloɓu ɓaya mamɔmɔ ɓɨnɨ na nɨɓɔ ɓɨnaga ɓagʉna ɓokoloɓu ɓaya mamɔmɔ.»
Nɨyɔ Ɓafalisayɔ ɓagɔgɔ nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ pa imoti na ɨɓʉ ɓʉkana mʉnzɨna mi nɨmɔ ɓɛyɔ, ɓamuusa kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ambɛ, ta kʉwa gɔnɨ iɓusu ɓʉgʉna koloɓu ya mamɔmɔ?»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Makiko ɓi no koloɓu ya mamɔmɔ, makikigʉ ɓi na ɓʉnyɛ. Luki limoti, mbɨya wanʉ makaɓɨkya ɓɛ: ‹Takaɨna.› Kinili, ma ka ɓʉnyɛ aka.»
Yeso oɓikyoku ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, mʉmbanzʉ kogulyi pisi ka mupumi ma lindilo ka ɓakɔndɔlɔ, luki limoti aɗaka, ingya ka ngala, a mʉtʉ wo kuɓakʉ na munzikaɓʉ.
Luki limoti, muɓuɓulyo ka ɓakɔndɔlɔ nɔ ogulyaga ɨyɨ pisi ka mupumi.
Zamʉ ahukwilyaga mupumi, ɓakɔndɔlɔ ɓʉkana lɨyʉ ka muɓuɓulyo. Ɨyɨ, apʉnga kaʉmaka yɨkaka-yɨkaka no mino kaɓʉ, upupisa kunzi.
Kupupiso ɓasɨ kunzi, akɨtaga kambwa kaɓʉ, apʉnga kakpakyana. Ɓakɔndɔlɔ aka ɓingbooo kumbusa kakɨ kyɛ ɓibatʉ lɨyʉ kakɨ.
Ɓakaɓɨɓyagɨgʉ mubiko. Luki limoti, ɓomisikono ɓingbwi, kyɛ ɓakibigʉ lɨyʉ ka mubiko.»
Yeso ʉtwɨlya ndɨ lizuni li nɨlɨ, luki limoti, ɓambanzʉ ɓakotombisyagʉ ndɨ.
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ɓata ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, ɨmɨ nɨ mupumi ma lindilo ka ɓakɔndɔlɔ.
Ɓasɨ nɨɓɔ ɓodoku ndɨ kambwa kamɨ, ɓa ɓatʉ ɓo kuɓakʉ na ɓonzikaɓʉ. Luki limoti, ɓakɔndɔlɔ ɓakʉmʉkanagʉ ndɨ.
Ɨmɨ nɨ mupumi. Mʉmbanzʉ kingyo pisi kʉ kamɨ inisanatʉ na muhukuso. Akwananatʉ kaingyo, opupoku, atakanya malɨlɨ aka.
Mʉtʉ wo kuɓakʉ odogoku ɨyɨ kaiɓo aka, kamwɔ na kapʉta. Ɨmɨ, nodoku kyɛ ɓambanzʉ ɓinisoni na ɔɓɨlɨ, na ɓiki na ɨyɨ wakpʉ kʉgbɛ.
Ɨmɨ na muɓuɓulyo wanza. Muɓuɓulyo wanza apága ɔɓɨlɨ kakɨ ko bulya ɓakɔndɔlɔ kakɨ.
Luki limoti, mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ogugubyaga ɓuyi aka kɛgʉ muɓuɓulyo, na gʉtʉgʉ ɓakɔndɔlɔ aka ɓakɛgʉ ɓakakɨ. Kamɨna sukopi kodoku, ʉsa, apɨkɨta. Sukopi yi nɨnɔ ubumbukya ɓakɔndɔlɔ, umisyo ɓingbwi.
A ɓɛyɔ, alʉkʉ yi nɨnɔ agyaga ligubo ko bulya ɓuyi aka, kikogigʉ no kumbu ka ɓakɔndɔlɔ.
Ɨmɨ na muɓuɓulyo wanza. Numibatʉ ɓakɔndɔlɔ kamɨ, ɓakɔndɔlɔ kamɨ ɓemiba gɔnɨ,
mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ Baba emibaga mino, namiba gɔnɨ Baba. Ɨmɨ, nakapá ɔɓɨlɨ kamɨ ko bulya ɓakɔndɔlɔ kamɨ.
Natʉ ɓata na ɓakɔndɔlɔ ɓagɔgɔ nɨɓɔ ɓakɛgʉ ka lindilo li nɨlɨ. Nokwononi gɔnɨ kaaga na ɨɓʉ, ɓʉkana lɨyʉ kamɨ. Moɗu masɨ maɓa ɓodoku kʉwa ambaza ɓemoti na muɓuɓulyo ɓemoti.
Baba ɛpaga kyɛ nakapá ɔɓɨlɨ kamɨ, kumbuso yi, ninisanatʉ ɓata na ɨyɨ.
Kɛgʉ na mʉmbanzʉ nɨnɔ akwanana kɛkʉpya ɔɓɨlɨ, luki limoti, nakapá na lɨmbɛngɨ kamɨ. Na no ngu kapá, na no ngu kainisono ɓata na ɨyɨ. Nɨyɔ akaɓyɛnɛnɛ na mʉtʉʉ nɨmɔ Baba ɛpá ndɨ.»
Ɓayuda ɓɨgbananaga ɓata ndɨ ka nganga ya yɨɓa ko bulya mʉnzɨna mi nɨmɔ.
Ɓatʉ ɓudingi luga kaɓʉ ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «A na lɨmbɛngɨ la ɓʉnyɛ! A na ibikyasʉ! Ma mbɛyɨ kamʉkana ko bulya ɨkɨ?»
Luki limoti, ɓatʉ ɓagɔgɔ ɓɛ: «Mʉnzɨna mi nɨma kɛgʉ mʉnzɨna ka mʉtʉ wa lɨmbɛngɨ la ɓʉnyɛ. Lɨmbɛngɨ la ɓʉnyɛ akwanana mbɛyɨ kauhukuso ɓatʉ ɓa ɓokoloɓu ɓaya mamɔmɔ lɨkɨ?»
Ka masyɛ mi nɨmɔ, ɓa ndɨ kalya dumo wakɨgɨlya koukwo Ndaɓʉ ko Kunzi ka Yelusalɛma. A ndɨ ko ngbingo wa ɓʉdɨ ɓapʉ.
Yeso a ndɨ kaɨnanaga magʉ ka Ndaɓʉ ko Kunzi kʉ ka Pa nɨyɔ ɓalɨkyaga ɓɛ Pa ka Sɔlɔmɔnɔ.
Ɓayuda ɓakungula kʉwa ndɨ ɓikululu, ɓamuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Wakatigbomisa ɓamʉ ɓɛnɛ kadwɛ ko ngbingo tino? Kika nɨ ɨwɛ nɨ Masiya, tɨɓɨkya nɛkɨ ɓɨngbanganya.»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Namuɓikyoni ndɨ. Luki limoti, makaɓɨnɨkyanagɨgʉ. Mogubo nɨmɔ nakagya ko lino ka Baba imu mɔ akepupilyo ɓʉdɛmʉ.
Luki limoti, iɓunu, makɛgʉ kaɓɨnɨkyana kyɛ makɛgʉ ɓakɔndɔlɔ kamɨ.
Ɓakɔndɔlɔ kamɨ ɓʉkanagatʉ lɨyʉ kamɨ, numibagatʉ, na ɓɛɓɨɓyagatʉ.
Ɨmɨ, nʉpága ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ, ɓakoɓungogigʉ ndɛkɛ. Gʉtʉgʉ mʉmbanzʉ ɓemoti aka kɛkʉpyɨgʉ ndɛkɛ ya kaɓʉ.
Baba nɔ ɛpá ndɨ ya kaɓʉ, na ɨyɨ a no ngu kakɨtaga makpʉmʉka masɨ. Kɛgʉ na mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka nɨnɔ akwanana kakʉpya luki.
Wɨna sɛ, iɓusu na Baba ta luki limoti.»
Ɓayuda ɓɨgɨlya kʉwa ndɨ kava matamʉ ɓɛ ɓamakagɨ nomu.
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓata ɓɛ: «Namuwonisila ndɨ mogubo manzanza mudingi kotukyoku ka Baba. Luga wa mogubo mi nɨmɔ, tino lɔ mo mino kapa kɛmaka na matamʉ?»
Ɓayuda ɓasikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Kɛgʉ ko bulya ligubo lanza lɔ to mino kapa kaʉmakaga na matamʉ, luki limoti, a kyɛ wakatʉmbwa Kunzi. Ɨwɛ wa mikya-ɓambanzʉ aka na wakapa kaɨgya abɛ Kunzi.»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ikpikaga ka mʉtʉʉ kunu ɓɛ Kunzi aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: ‹Iɓunu ma ɓokunzi.›
Mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kakwananɨgʉ kolimogo Moɓiso. Luki limoti, Kunzi ʉmaka ndɨ ɓɛ ɓokunzi ɓatʉ nɨɓɔ ɓamʉkanaga ndɨ.
Baba ɛpʉnaga ndɨ ɨmɨ, etikoku ka ɔɓɨlɨ. Kinili, naɓɨkyaga ɓɛ na Miko Kunzi. Makwanana pɨyɛ kaɓɨkya lɨkɨ ɓɛ nakatʉmbwa Kunzi?
Kika nɨ nakɛgʉ kagya mogubo ka Baba, makeɓinikyonito.
Luki limoti, nakagya, ɓinikyononi gʉtʉgʉ kʉwa mogubo kamɨ aka, gʉtʉgʉ makɛɓinikyoni ɨmɨ. Wiboni, motombisyo ɓɨnza ɓɛ Baba a kʉsɔ kamɨ, na ɨmɨ kʉsɔ kakɨ.»
Ɓakɨsa ɓata ndɨ kagwi, luki limoti, ʉʉkaga.
Yeso ɨga ndɨ kʉsyakʉ wa Yɔlɔdanɨ kʉ Yuani oɓotisaga ndɨ mino ka ɓʉndɛlɨ, ika ndɨ kʉ ɓɛyɔ.
Ɓambanzʉ ɓudingi ɓadulyoku ndɨ, ɓanaɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Yuani kagyagʉ ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka lɨmbanga gʉtʉgʉ limoti aka. Luki limoti, lasɨ nɨlɔ atʉmbʉlaga ndɨ ko bulya ka Yeso a ndɨ lɨngʉnʉ.»
Na kʉ ɓɛyɔ, ɓatʉ ɓudingi ɓaɓɨnɨkyana ndɨ.
A ndɨ na mʉtʉ wo koloɓu ɓemoti nɨnɔ ina ndɨ ɓɛ Lazalɔ. Ɨyɨ Lazalɔ ikaga ndɨ ka mugi ma Betania. Ɓasalɨ kakɨ ɓɛyɔ ka Malia na Malata ɓikaga ndɨ kʉ gɔ kʉ.
(A Malia yi nɨnɔ ogboɗya ndɨ magʉ ka Mombukwono-dosu na malazi, akpaga no tukatʉ kakɨ. Mamakɨ ɓɛyɔ ka Lazalɔ nɔ a ndɨ no koloɓu.)
Ɓasalɨ ɓaɓa ɓi nɨɓɔ ɓatɨkɨlya ndɨ Yeso mayʉ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, wai-dakʉ akaɨmʉkana.»
Nɨyɔ Yeso ʉkana mino mongoni mi nɨmɔ, ɨyɨ aka ɓɛ: «Kokwigʉ no koloɓu yi nɨyɔ. Luki limoti, isi yi nɨ kowonisilo ɨbɨba ko Kunzi, kyɛ Mikakɨ avɨ ɨbɨba.»
Wɨna sɛ, Yeso apaga ndɨ Lazalɔ pa imoti na ɓasalɨ kakɨ ɓɛyɔ ka Malia na Malata.
Luki limoti, nɨyɔ ʉkana ndɨ ɓɛ Lazalɔ a no koloɓu, agya mbɛyɨ ɓata masyɛ maɓa ka pa nɨyɔ a ndɨ mino yɔ,
kumbuso yi, ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓɛ: «Tigini ɓata ka Yudɛa.»
Ɓaɓɨɓya ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Muwonisilo, Ɓayuda ɓo ɓi kakɨsa kaʉmwɔ na matamʉ mbɨya aka ɓi wanʉ. Wa ɓata kapa kaɨga kʉ ɓɛyɔ?»
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Takɛgʉ mbɛyɨ na ɓasaa tɛkɛɓɛ na ɓaɓa ka lɨsyɛ limoti? Kika nɨ mʉmbanzʉ akakpakyana na lɨsyɛ kakwananɨgʉ kasakaga, kyɛ akaɨna ɓɨngbanganya.
Luki limoti, mʉmbanzʉ kakpakyana no biti, asakagatʉ kyɛ kɛgʉ kaɨna ɓɨngbanganya.»
Kumbuso kaɓɨkya ɓɛyɔ, Yeso amatɨla ɓata ndɨ ɓɛ: «Wai-dosu ɓɛyɔ ka Lazalɔ a ka tɔtɔ, luki limoti, nakaɨnda kazuzukiso.»
Ɓaɓɨɓya ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, kika nɨ a ka tɔtɔ, ahʉkatʉ.»
A ɓɛyɔ, Yeso a ndɨ kaɓɨkya ɓɛ Lazalɔ okwini, luki limoti, ɓaɓɨɓya ɓa ndɨ ɨɓʉ kasɨma ɓɛ a kanzɨna ko bulya tɔtɔ aka.
Yeso ʉɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɨngbanganya ɓɛ: «Lazalɔ okwini ɓi.
Nakogwa magyagya ko bulya kunu, kyɛ nakɛgʉ ɓi kʉ. Na ɓɛyɔ, makwananatʉ kɛɓɨnɨkyana. Luki limoti, togoni kʉ kakɨ.»
Kʉwa wa, Tʉma nɨnɔ ɓamakaga gɔnɨ ɓɛ «Muɓigi» ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓaɓɨɓya ɓadakɨ ɓɛ: «Togoni nɛkɨ kʉwa ɓasɨ aka, iba tolumwogi pa imoti na ɨɓʉ.»
Nɨyɔ Yeso osila ndɨ, atakanya Lazalɔ nɨ a kʉwa na masyɛ makwanganya ka mbʉkʉ.
Betania a ɓuwobi na Yelusalɛma, banda ɓakilɔmɛtɛlɛ ɓasaa aka.
Kinili, Ɓayuda ɓakpʉ ɓa ndɨ nɨ ɓodunuku katakanya Malia na Malata, kautumiso mambɛngɨ ko bulya kukwakʉ ka mamaɓʉ.
Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ Malata ʉkana mino ɓɛ Yeso akodoku, ɨnda ndɨ katɨlya. Luki limoti, Malia asɨkana ndɨ ɨyɨ wakiko ka ndaɓʉ.
Malata aɓɨkya ndɨ Yeso ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, wakiko ɓi wanʉ, iba mika-mama kokwigʉ.
Luki limoti, mbɨya wanʉ, nakaiba ambɛ masɨ nɨmɔ wakʉnga Kunzi, ʉpátʉ.»
Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mamakʉ akopupa ka mbʉkʉ.»
Malata asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Nakaiba ambɛ opupokuto ndɛkɛ ngbingo yi nɨnɔ ɓambanzʉ ɓopupa ndɛkɛ mino ka lɨsyɛ la muliɓo.»
Yeso aka ndɨ na ɨyɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ nɔ nupupisaga ɓambanzʉ ka ɓambʉkʉ, ɨmɨ nɨ ɔɓɨlɨ. Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ɛɓɨnɨkyana, ika ndɛkɛ na ɔɓɨlɨ gʉtʉgʉ kokwo.
Mʉmbanzʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ ikaga kʉsɔ kamɨ, kɛɓɨnɨkyana, kokwigʉ ndɛkɛ. Watʉ kaɓɨnɨkyana lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɔ?»
Asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Iyo, Mombukwono-dosu, nakaɓɨnɨkyana ambɛ ɨwɛ nɨ Masiya, Miko Kunzi, nɨnɔ akwanana ndɨ kodoku ka ɔɓɨlɨ.»
Nɨyɔ Malata aɓɨkya ɓɛyɔ, aga ndɨ. Kʉwa wa, amaka Malia, aɓɨkya na ɓepisi-pisi ɓɛ: «Muwonisilo a kʉ, akaʉmaka.»
Nɨyɔ aka yɔ Malia ʉkana ɓɛyɔ, atʉkya ndɨ ɓɨkwa, ɨnda katakanya.
Wɨna sɛ, Yeso a ndɨ nɨ kanodwigʉ ka mʉsɛngɨ. A mbɛyɨ ndɨ ka pa nɨyɔ Malata ɨnda ndɨ mino katɨlya.
Ɓayuda nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ katumisa Malia lɨmbɛngɨ ka ndaɓʉ kʉ, ɓamɨna ndɨ kaamaga ɓɨkwa na kopupo. Ɓaɓyɛ, ɓa ndɨ kasɨma ɓɛ akaɨnda kagama ka mbʉkʉ.
Nɨyɔ Malia osila kʉ Yeso a ndɨ mino, amɨna, ogwa ka magʉ kakɨ, aɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, wakiko ɓi wanʉ, iba mika-mama kokwigʉ.»
Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ Yeso amɨna ndɨ mino kagama, ʉmɨna gɔnɨ Ɓayuda nɨɓɔ ɓodoku ndɨ na ɨɓʉ kagama, nzʉyɨ atwa ndɨ ɓɨkyakyakya, alya kumbu kʉgbɛ.
Uusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mabisiku ɓi yanɨ?» Ɓasikisya ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, dawɨnɨnɔ.»
Yeso agama ndɨ.
Ɓayuda ɓaɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a ndɨ wai-dakɨ aka!»
Luki limoti, ɓagɔgɔ luga kaɓʉ ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Sɨ ɨyɨ nɔ ahukusa ndɨ mʉtʉ wo koloɓu ya mamɔmɔ. Kakwananɨgʉ gɔnɨ ɓi kakpɨngbɨlya Lazalɔ kukwakʉ?»
Nzʉyɨ atwa ɓata ndɨ Yeso, aga ka mbʉkʉ. Mbʉkʉ yi nɨyɔ ɓakpɔ ndɨ ka lɨtalʉ, ɓotikya na lɨtalʉ lidingi ɓikpwu.
Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Tumboni lɨtalʉ!» Mamakɨ Lazalɔ ɓɛyɔ ka Malata aɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, a kʉwa kolumbo, kyɛ a kʉwa na masyɛ makwanganya wa ɓalumbi ɓi mino.»
Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Nakuɓikyigʉ mbɛyɨ ɓi ambɛ wakaɓɨnɨkyana, wɨnatʉ ɨbɨba ko Kunzi?»
Ɓatʉmba kʉwa ndɨ lɨtalʉ. Yeso ɨkwɛ ndɨ kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ, aɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Babooo, nakaubibiso kyɛ wemukonini.
Ɨmɨ, nibagatʉ ambɛ wɛmʉkanaga masyɛ masɨ. Luki limoti, noɓikyi ɓɛyɔ ko bulya ka ɓambanzʉ nɨɓana ɓekunguli ɓa, iba ɓaɓɨnɨkyanitɔ ɓɛ ɨwɛ nɔ wetikoku ndɨ.»
Nɨyɔ aɓɨkya ɓɛyɔ, apamɨkana ndɨ na lɨyʉ lapʉ ɓɛ: «Lazalɔ, pupoku!»
Opupoku kʉwa ndɨ, magʉ na maɓɔkʉ mʉkandaga na ɓapanga ɓaya ɓotu, miso mutikya na kutuko. Yeso ʉɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mukulogoni, masa aga.»
Ɓayuda ɓakpʉ nɨɓɔ ɓodoku ndɨ ka Malia, ɓaɓɨnɨkyana ndɨ Yeso kaɨna nɨlɔ agya ndɨ.
Luki limoti, ɓagɔgɔ luga kaɓʉ, ɓɨnda ndɨ ka Ɓafalisayɔ na ɓʉtʉmbʉlyaga lɨkpʉmʉka nɨlɔ Yeso agya ndɨ lɔ.
Kʉwa wa, ɓokumu-kumu na Ɓafalisayɔ ɓamʉmʉkana ndɨ ka Basa-Yidingi kaɓʉ, ɓaɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Tagya sɛ ɓʉ? Alʉkʉ mʉna a kʉwa kagya mokingyosi makpʉ.
Takasɨlya ngbingo kagyaga aka ɓɛyɔ, ɓatʉ ɓasɨ ɓaɓɨnɨkyanatʉ. Kumbuso yi, Ɓalʉma ɓodoku kʉwa ɓanʉ kapʉta Ndaɓʉ ko Kunzi na mugi kusu.»
Luki limoti, ɓemoti luga kaɓʉ, nɨnɔ ina ndɨ ɓɛ Kayafa na nɨnɔ a ndɨ kumu-kumu ka syangasʉ si nɨsɔ, ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Iɓunu, makibigʉ luki!
Makibigʉ ambɛ a gʉtʉgʉ ɓɨnza mʉmbanzʉ ɓemoti kokwo ko bulya ka ɓatʉ ɓudingi? Kigyonoso ɓɛyɔ, lɨvananza lasɨ kolumwogigʉ.»

(Mʉnzɨna mi nɨmɔ kotukyokugʉ ndɨ kakɨ ka mombukwana-dakɨ yi. Luki limoti, ɓɛyɔ a ndɨ mino kumu-kumu ka syangasʉ nɨsɔ, a ndɨ kaɓɨkya na ɓugyalandʉ ɓɛ Yeso akwanana ndɨ kokwo ko bulya lɨvananza ka Ɓayuda.
Na kukwakʉ kakɨ kɛgʉ asɨ ko bulya ka Ɓayuda aka. Luki limoti, a gɔnɨ ko bulya kaʉmʉmʉla ka imoti, ɓomiko Kunzi nɨɓɔ ɓomisikana ndɨ ɓingbwi.)
Katʉkya kʉwa ndɨ ka lɨsyɛ nɨlɔ aka lɔ, ɓangama ka Ɓayuda ɓʉkanana ndɨ kamwisiso Yeso.

Kinili, Yeso kipupisogigʉ ndɨ ɓata ɓɨngbanganya luga ka Ɓayuda. Luki limoti, atʉkya kʉwa ndɨ wa, ɨnda ka iwili nɨyɔ ɓuwobi na ɨsa, ka gʉɗʉ nɨnɔ ina ndɨ ɓɛ Efulaimu. Ɓikaga kʉwa ndɨ kʉ pa imoti na ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ.
Yɨnga ya Pasɨka ka Ɓayuda a kʉwa ndɨ ɓuwobi. Ɓambanzʉ ɓudingi ɓatʉkya ndɨ ko giyo kaɓʉ, ɓaɗamba ka Yelusalɛma kaiɓuɓiso kambwa wa yɨnga ya Pasɨka.
Ɓa ndɨ kakɨsa Yeso ɓɨvaka-vaka, ɓanimuuso luga kaɓʉ kʉ ka Ndaɓʉ ko Kunzi ɓɛ: «Makaɨna ɓʉnɨ? Odokutɔ gɔnɨ ka yɨnga ikanɨ kodukugʉ?»
Ɓokumu-kumu na Ɓafalisayɔ ɓa ndɨ nɨ ɓopíni mʉtʉʉ ɓɛ mʉmbanzʉ kibo kʉ Yeso o mino, akwanana kaʉɓɨkya kyɛ ɓɨndɨ kagwi.
Masyɛ maɗɨya kambwa wa yɨnga ya Pasɨka, Yeso aga ndɨ ka Betania, kʉ ka Lazalɔ nɨnɔ apupisa ndɨ ka mbʉkʉ.
Kʉ ɓɛyɔ, ɓambambambya ndɨ. Malata nɔ a ndɨ kaugugubyo. Lazalɔ a ndɨ ɓemoti ka nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ pa imoti na Yeso ka mɨza.
Kʉwa wa, Malia ava ndɨ supa ya malazi matʉmbɛ-tʉmbɛ na ma lɨgabʉ lapʉ. Agboɗyo kʉwa ndɨ na imu Yeso ka magʉ, akpaga no tukatʉ kakɨ. Sʉ ya malazi ohuma ndɨ ndaɓʉ yasɨ.
Luki limoti Yuda Isikalioti, ɓemoti ka ɓaɓɨɓya ka Yeso, nɨnɔ agaba ɓanʉ, aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ:
«Ko bulya ɨkɨ yɔ ɓakogobigʉ mino malazi mi nɨma ka ɓambuma ɓamɨya ɓasaa
, ɓʉpá ɓatʉ ɓa yangya ɓuyi ɓi?»
Kaɓɨkyagʉ ndɨ ɓɛyɔ kyɛ a ndɨ kaʉmɨnɨlya ɓatʉ ɓa yangya kumbu, luki limoti, kyɛ a ndɨ mʉtʉ wo kuɓakʉ. Ɨyɨ nɔ oɓuulyaga ndɨ mʉmbɨ ma apɛpɛ na iɓagatʉ ndɨ mino ɓuyi ɓi.
Luki limoti, Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mʉsa! Ogyi ɓɛyɔ ko bulya lɨsyɛ nɨlɔ ɓelumbo ndɛkɛ mino.
A ɓɛyɔ, mika ndɛkɛ pa imoti na ɓatʉ ɓa yangya masyɛ masɨ. Luki limoti, ɨmɨ, takikigʉ ndɛkɛ pa imoti na iɓunu aka.»
Ambaza mudingi ka Ɓayuda iba ndɨ ɓɛ Yeso a ndɨ ka Betania. Ɓɨnda kʉwa ndɨ kʉ, kɛgʉ asɨ ko bulya ka Yeso aka, luki limoti, kyɛ ɓamɨnɨ gɔnɨ Lazalɔ nɨnɔ ɨyi Yeso apupisa ndɨ ka mbʉkʉ.
Kʉwa wa, ɓokumu-kumu ɓʉkanana ndɨ gɔnɨ ɓɛ ɓamwisisi Lazalɔ,
kyɛ Ɓayuda ɓakpʉ ɓa ndɨ kopupo ka mʉɗɔngɔ kaɓʉ ko bulya kakɨ, na kaɓɨnɨkyana Yeso.
Na ɓʉgalo ɓi, ambaza wakpʉ nɨnɔ odoku ndɨ ka yɨnga wa Pasɨka ʉkana ndɨ ɓɛ Yeso a gɔnɨ kodoku ka Yelusalɛma.
Ɓava ndɨ mangʉ, ɓaga katɨlya nɨ ɓanapamɨkanaga ɓɛ:
«Ɨbɨba ko Kunzi!
Kunzi aɗukulyi mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ akodoku ko lino ka Mombukwono-dosu ɓʉɓʉnga!
Kunzi aɗukulyi ngama wa Izaleli ɓʉɓʉnga.»
Yeso inisana ndɨ no mikya punda, aɗaka kʉgʉ yi. Igyonosa ndɨ mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ikpikaga ndɨ mino ɓɛ:
«Makoɓongonitɔgʉ, iɓunu ɓatʉ ɓa gʉɗʉ wa Siona!
Winoni, ngama kunu odunuku,
a wakiko kʉgʉ wa mikya punda.»

Ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓakotombisyagʉ mbɛyɨ ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɔ ɓɨkwa. Luki limoti, ngbingo yi nɨnɔ Yeso ogulya ndɨ mino ka ɨbɨba, ɓatamana sɛ kʉwa ɓɛ lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɔ ikpikaga ndɨ ko bulya kakɨ, ɓambanzʉ ɓagyɨlya ndɨ ɓɛyɔ aka yɔ.
Ɓambanzʉ ɓasɨ nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ pa imoti na Yeso ngbingo yi nɨnɔ apupisoku ndɨ mino Lazalɔ ka mbʉkʉ, na azuzukiso luga ka ɓamanda, ɓatʉmbʉlaga ndɨ nɨlɔ ɓɨna ndɨ no miso.
Kinili, ambaza ka ɓambanzʉ odoku ndɨ katɨlya. A ndɨ nɨ ukonini ɓɛ Yeso nɔ agya ndɨ likingyosi nɨlɔ.
Ɓafalisayɔ ɓaɓɨkyana kʉwa luga kaɓʉ ɓɛ: «Minini! Makakwananɨgʉ ɓata kagya luki. Ɓambanzʉ ɓasɨ ɓa kʉwa kumbuso kakɨ aka!»
Luga ka ɓatʉ nɨɓɔ ɓodoku ndɨ kabibiso Kunzi ngbinga wa yɨnga, Ɓagiliki ɓemoti-ɓemoti ɓatʉ ndɨ gɔnɨ wa.
Ɓakpuɗoku ndɨ Filipi, nɨnɔ a ndɨ mʉtʉ wa gʉɗʉ wa Bɛtɛsaida ka iwili ya Galilaya, ɓaɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Alʉkʉ, to ɓi kapa kamɨna Yeso.»
Filipi ɨnda ndɨ kaɓɨkya Andɨlɨa. Ɨɓʉ ɓasɨ ɓaɓa ɓɨnda kaɓɨkya Yeso.
Yeso usikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ngbingo itulyonini nɨnɔ Mika-mʉmbanzʉ ava mino ɨbɨba.
A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, lɨsɔlɔ kogwi ka lɨtɔmbʉ, okwo, ika ndɛkɛ asɨ ilu aka. Luki limoti, kokwo, aɓʉkʉta kʉwa bumo yakpʉ.
Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ apaga ɔɓɨlɨ kakɨ aɓungusatʉ. Luki limoti, nɨnɔ amʉyaga ɔɓɨlɨ kakɨ ka lɨtɔmbʉ li nɨlɨ, ika ndɛkɛ na ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ.
Mʉmbanzʉ kapa kegugubyo, ɛɓɨɓyɨ. Mʉgya-ligubo kamɨ ika ndɛkɛ kʉ gɔ kʉ ɨmɨ niko mino. Mʉmbanzʉ kika mʉgya-ligubo kamɨ, Baba abibisatʉ.»
«Mbɨya wanʉ, lɨmbɛngɨ egwini ɓʉpɔ. Naɓɨkya ɓʉ? Naɓɨkyɨ sɛ kʉwa ɓɛ: Babooo, ihukusaganɔ ɓaka ko ngbingo wa yigyogyiso yi nɨmʉ? Luki limoti, ngbingo yi nɨnɔ nadulyoku ndɨ nɨmʉna aka mʉ.
Ba, bibisanɔ lino kakʉ!» Kʉwa wa, lɨyʉ otukyoku ndɨ kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ ɓɛ: «Nobibisoni lino kamɨ, nɨgɨlyatʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata kobibiso.»
Ambaza ka ɓambanzʉ nɨnɔ a ndɨ wakamaga wa, ʉkana ndɨ lɨyʉ li nɨlɔ, aɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Ngbangbata sɛ nɔ opomikoni!» Ɓagɔgɔ ɓɛ: «Malaika nɔ anzinilyi!»
Luki limoti, Yeso ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Lɨyʉ li nɨlɨ kopupigʉ ko bulya kamɨ, luki limoti, ko bulya kunu.
Ngbingo itulyonini, Kunzi akapʉnga kakɔ mʉngɨmbɔ ma ɔɓɨlɨ yi nɨmʉ. Mbɨya wanʉ, akakpumyo ngama wa ɔɓɨlɨ yi nɨmʉ.
Wa ɓeɗokisa ndɛkɛ mino kʉgʉ, nuluta ndɛkɛ ɓambanzʉ ɓasɨ kʉ kamɨ.»
Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛyɔ kowonisilo ɓɛ inguo ya kukwakʉ tina kwɔ okwa ndɛkɛ.

Ambaza ka ɓambanzʉ asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Iɓusu, tʉkana ndɨ ka mʉtʉʉ ɓɛ Masiya ika ndɛkɛ ɨyɨ na ɔɓɨlɨ aka kadwɛ ka ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ. Wa kʉwa kaɓɨkya lɨkɨ ɓɛ: ‹Okwononi ɓɛ ɓaɗokisi Mika-mʉmbanzʉ kʉgʉ.› Mika-mʉmbanzʉ yi nɨnɔ nɨ wanɨ?»
Yeso aka ndɨ na ɨɓʉ ɓɛ: «Ɓʉngbanganya atʉ mbɛyɨ ɓata luga kunu ko ngbinga mʉkɛɗɛ. Kpokyononi na lɨsyɛ, kyɛ biti kamuhumonito. Mʉtʉ nɨnɔ akpakyanaga no biti, kibogigʉ ɓɛ akaaga yanɨ.
Ɓinikyononi nɛkɨ ɓʉngbanganya ngbingo yi nɨnɔ ma mbɛyɨ mino na ɨɓʉ aka, kyɛ mɨɨtɨ ɓatʉ ɓa ɓʉngbanganya.»
Kumbuso Yeso kaɓɨkya ɓɛyɔ, ɨmagalya ndɨ ɨyɨ, isumoku.
Gʉtʉgʉ ɓɛyɔ Yeso agya ndɨ mino mokingyosi mʉmbanga-mbanga ko misa ka ɓʉ ɓɛyɔ, ɓakaɓɨnɨkyanagʉ ndɨ,
kʉwa wa gʉ wa, mʉnzɨna nɨmɔ mugyalandʉ Isaya aɓɨkya ndɨ ɨtʉlyana:
«Mombukwono-dosu, wanɨ nɔ aɓɨnɨkyana ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka nɨlɔ ta ndɨ kaɓɨkyaga?
Mombukwono-dosu awonisila ndɨ wanɨ kʉɓɔkʉkɔ kwo ngu kakɨ?»
Kinili, ɓakakwananɨgʉ ndɨ kaɓɨnɨkyana, kaɓyɛnɛnɛ na nɨlɔ Isaya aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓata ɓɛ:
«Kunzi udulogoni ndɨ miso,
ʉdʉlaga yimibo.
Agya ndɨ ɓɛyɔ,
kyɛ ɓakinogonitɔgʉ ɓata,
yimibo kaɓʉ kotombisyogonitɔgʉ ɓata luki.
Kinili, ɓakoyikosagʉ ndɨ ɔɓɨlɨ kaɓʉ,
Iba nuhukusatʉ ndɨ!»
Isaya aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛyɔ kyɛ ɨna ndɨ ɨbɨba ka Yeso kambwa, anzɨnagatʉ ndɨ ko bulya kakɨ.
Gʉtʉgʉ ɓɛyɔ, ɓudingi luga ka ɓangama ka Ɓayuda ɓaɓɨnɨkyanatʉ ndɨ. Ɓakɛgʉ ndɨ kapa kaipupiso kyɛ Ɓafalisayɔ ɓakukpumyoni ka ndaɓʉ ya malʉmba kaɓʉ.
A ɓɛyɔ, Ɓafalisayɔ ɓapaga ndɨ ɨɓʉ ɨbɨba ka ɓambanzʉ kakɨtaga nɨyɔ odogoku ko Kunzi.
Kʉwa wa, Yeso apamɨkana ɓɛ: «Nɨnɔ ɛɓɨnɨkyana, kɛɓɨnɨkyanagʉ ɨmɨ aka, luki limoti, aɓɨnɨkyana gɔnɨ nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ.
Nɨnɔ akɛmɨna, akamɨna gɔnɨ nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ.
Ɨmɨ, nodoku ndɨ ka ɔɓɨlɨ abɛ ɓʉngbanganya, kyɛ mʉtʉ wasɨ nɨnɔ ɛɓɨnɨkyana kikonitɔgʉ ko biti.
Mʉmbanzʉ kʉkana lɨkpʉmʉka kamɨ nɨ kogyigʉ, nakakʉlyɨgʉ mʉkɔmbʉ. A ɓɛyɔ, nakodokugʉ ndɨ kakɔ mʉngɨmbɔ ka ɔɓɨlɨ, luki limoti, nodoku ndɨ kahukuso.
Mʉmbanzʉ kɛmʉya, akya kaɓɨnɨkyana lɨkpʉmʉka kamɨ, a na zozi kakɨ. Mʉtɨwɨ nɨmɔ napága ndɨ mɔ abisa ndɛkɛ ka mʉngɨmbɔ ka lɨsyɛ la muliɓo.
A ɓɛyɔ, nakanzɨnagɨgʉ ko ngu kamɨ ɓɨkpɛ. Baba nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ nɔ ɛkpamya ndɨ ɨyɨ mombukwana-dakɨ yi ɓɛ nakwanana kaɓɨkya ikanɨ katɨwa ɓʉnɨ.
Nakaiba ɓɨnza ambɛ, mʉtʉʉ ka Baba apága ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ. Kinili, nɨlɔ naɓɨkyaga, ikaga mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ aka yɔ Baba ɛkpamya ndɨ mino.»

A ndɨ nɨ otigolini lɨsyɛ limoti kadwɛ ka Pasɨka. Yeso a kʉwa ndɨ kaimibo ɓɛ ngbingo kakɨ itulyonini katʉkya ka ɔɓɨlɨ yi nɨmʉ na kaaga ka abakɨ. Ʉpaga ndɨ ɓava-kʉkakɨ nɨɓɔ ɓikaga ndɨ ka ɔɓɨlɨ, idukulogo kaʉpa kadwɛ ka muliɓo.
Yeso na ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓa ndɨ kalya malɨlɨ ma ɓʉgɔgɔ. Mumuyoniso a ndɨ nɨ amingyini Yuda mika Simoni-Isikalioti ɓɛ agabɨ Yeso.
Yeso a ndɨ kaiba ɓɛ Abakɨ apá ndɨ ngu ka makpʉmʉka masɨ, na gɔnɨ ɓɛ otukyoku ndɨ kʉ kakɨ ko Kunzi na a ndɨ kaɨga kʉ gɔ kʉ.
Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ ɓa mbɛyɨ ndɨ mino aka ka mɨza, amaga ndɨ, ɨnyɔ kutuko kwa mbanzɨ, ava kutuko kumoti ɓɛnɛ, ɨkpɨkɨla ka ɨɗʉkʉfɨsɔ.
Kumbuso yi, oɗuka ndɨ liɓo ka sani, apʉnga kaʉsʉkʉsa ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ magʉ na kaʉkpaga na kutuko nɨkwɔ ɨkpɨkɨla ndɨ ka ɨɗʉkʉfɨsɔ.
Nɨyɔ adwɛ ka Simoni Pɛtɛlɛ, ɨyɨ Pɛtɛlɛ amuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, ɨwɛ kʉwa nɔ wakɛsʉkʉsa magʉ?»
Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Nɨlɔ nakagya mbɨya wanʉ wakibigʉ, luki limoti, wibatʉ ɓanʉ.»
Pɛtɛlɛ aka ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨwɛ kɛsʉkʉsa ɨmɨ magʉ? Kɨgyananɨgʉ!» Luki limoti, Yeso aka na ɨyɨ ɓɛ: «Nakusukusi magʉ, takikigʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata pa imoti na ɨwɛ.»
Simoni Pɛtɛlɛ aɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓata ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, kiko nɛkɨ nɨ a ɓɛyɔ, wakɛsukusonitɔgʉ asɨ magʉ aka. Luki limoti, ɨsʉkʉsatʉ gɔnɨ maɓɔkʉ na mʉ!»
Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ isukusogi, kɛgʉ ɓata na nza ya kɨsʉkʉsaga, akwanana kʉwa kaɨsʉkʉsa asɨ magʉ aka. A ɓɛyɔ, iɓunu ma ɓɨngɔ, luki limoti kɛgʉ iɓunu ɓasɨ.»
A ɓɛyɔ, Yeso a ndɨ kamibo mʉtʉ nɨnɔ agaba ɓanʉ, kinili aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Iɓunu ɓasɨ makɛgʉ ɓɨngɔ.»
Nɨyɔ ʉma kaʉsʉkʉsa magʉ, imokisyo ɓata ndɨ kutuko kakɨ kwa mbanzɨ, igoku ɓata kalyalya, umuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mibito isi ya lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɔ namugyilyi?
Iɓunu, mɛmakaga ɓɛ Muwonisilo, Mombukwono-dosu, maɓɨkyaga lɨngʉnʉ, kyɛ na ɓɛyɔ aka yɔ.
Kika nɛkɨ nɨ ɨmɨ, Muwonisilo na Mombukwono-donu, namusukusini magʉ, iɓunu makwanana gɔnɨ kasʉkʉsana magʉ luga kunu.
A ɓɛyɔ, ɨmɨ namupí likingyosi, kyɛ gyoni iɓunu mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛgɛyɔ namugyilyi mino.
A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, musunzu kakwananɨgʉ kaiko ngama ka mombukwana-dakɨ, gʉtʉgʉ atʉtʉmbwa aka kakwananɨgʉ kakɨtaga mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ atiki.
Mbɨya wanʉ mibini lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɔ, makagya ɓɛyɔ namugyilyi mino, mika ndɛkɛ ɓatʉ ɓa magyagya.»

Yeso omotiloku ndɨ ɓɛ: «Lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɨ, nakɛgʉ kamʉɓɨkya iɓunu ɓasɨ. Ɨmɨ, nakaumibo ɓatʉ nɨɓɔ nupunogoni ndɨ. Luki limoti, okwononi itulyosi nɨlɔ ikpikaga ndɨ ka Moɓiso Motu ɓɛ: ‹Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ talyalyaga ndɨ na ɨyɨ, eitilyini›.
Namuɓikyi lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɨ mbɨya yi nɨmʉ kambwa ɓɛ igyonosi. Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ igyonosa ɓanʉ mino, maɓɨnɨkyana ɓanʉ ɓɛ ‹ɨmɨ, natʉ›.
A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, mʉmbanzʉ katɨlya mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ natiki, etilyi ɨmɨ. Mʉmbanzʉ kɛtɨlya, atilyi gɔnɨ nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ.»
Nɨyɔ Yeso ama ndɨ mino kanzɨna ɓɛyɔ, lɨmbɛngɨ alya ndɨ kumbu, aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɨngbanganya ɓɛ: «A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, ɓemoti kunu ɛgabatʉ.»
Ɓaɓɨɓya ɓapʉnga ndɨ kaandanana luga kaɓʉ, nɨ ɓakɛgʉ kotombisyo ɓɛ akanzɨna ko bulya ka wanɨ.
Wa ɓa ndɨ mino kalyalya, ɓemoti ka ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ nɨnɔ ɨyɨ Yeso apaga ndɨ, a ndɨ ka kpɔlɔ kakɨ.
Simoni Pɛtɛlɛ anʉta ndɨ mʉɓɨɓya yi nɨnɔ ɓɛ kyɛ amuusi Yeso ikanɨ a ndɨ kaɓɨkya lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɔ ko bulya ka wanɨ.
Mʉɓɨɓya yi nɨnɔ ɨgʉmya ndɨ ka Yeso, amuusa ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, wanɨ?»
Yeso asikisya ndɨ: «Nakolubo dongbu ya mukati mi nɨma ko supu, mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ napá, iba ɨyɨ nɨnɔ.» Yeso olubo kʉwa ndɨ, apá Yuda Isikalioti mika Simoni.
Nɨyɔ aka yɔ Yuda ava, Abɨlɨ ingya ndɨ kʉsɔ kakɨ. Yeso aka ndɨ na ɨyɨ ɓɛ: «Nɨyɔ wakapa kagya, gya ɓɨgala-gala.»
Gʉtʉgʉ mʉtʉ ɓemoti aka luga ka nɨɓɔ ɓa ndɨ kalyalya wa, kotombisyagʉ ndɨ isi ya mʉnzɨna mi nɨmɔ.
A ɓɛyɔ, yɛkɨ Yuda nɔ oɓuulyaga ndɨ ɓuyi, ɓatʉ ɓagɔgɔ luga ka ɓaɓɨɓya ɓa ndɨ kasɨma ɓɛ Yeso akaɓɨkya ɓɛ oluwi malɨlɨ nɨmɔ ɓakwanana ndɨ kalya ka yɨnga, ikanɨ ɨndɨ kaʉpá ɓatʉ ɓa yangya luki lɨkɛɗɛ.
Yuda ava kʉwa ndɨ dongbu ya mukati mi nɨmɔ, ko ngbingo yi nɨnɔ aka nɔ, opupa ndɨ. A kʉwa ndɨ nɨ biti olipyini.
Nɨyɔ Yuda opupo, Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mbɨya-mbɨya yi nɨmʉ, Mika-Mʉmbanzʉ ovini ɨbɨba, Kunzi ovini gɔnɨ ɨbɨba pisi kʉ kakɨ.
Kika nɨ Kunzi ovini ɨbɨba pisi kʉ kakɨ, ɨyɨ Kunzi mombukwana-dakɨ yi owonisilatʉ gɔnɨ ɨyɨ ɨbɨba ko Miki pisi kʉ kakɨ ɓɨkwa.
Ɓomikamɨ, nakɛgʉ ɓata na iɓunu ko ngbingo mʉnda. Mɛkɨsatʉ, luki limoti, mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ nʉɓɨkya ndɨ mino Ɓayuda, namuɓikyi kʉwa gɔnɨ iɓunu mbɨya yi nɨmʉ ɓɛ: makakwananɨgʉ kaɨnda kʉ ɨmɨ no mino kaaga.
Nakamʉpá mʉtʉʉ mambɨya: ponononi luga kunu. Mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ɨmɨ namʉpa ndɨ mino, ponononi iɓunu ɓɛgɛyɔ.
Kika nɨ ma na sɨpananɨsɔ luga kunu, ɓatʉ ɓasɨ ɓiba ndɛkɛ ɓɛ ma ɓaɓɨɓya kamɨ.»
Simoni Pɛtɛlɛ amuusa ndɨ Yeso ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, wa sɛ kʉwa kaɨnda yanɨ?» Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Kʉ no mino kaɨnda, wakakwananɨgʉ kɛɓyɛ mbɨya wanʉ, luki limoti, wɛɓyɛtʉ ndɛkɛ kumbuso.»
Pɛtɛlɛ amuuso ɓata ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, ko bulya ɨkɨ nakakwananɨgʉ kaʉɓyɛ mbɨya wanʉ? Na wakɨtʉlya kapá ɔɓɨlɨ kamɨ ko bulya kakʉ.»
Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Watʉ aka wakɨtʉlya kapá ɔɓɨlɨ kakʉ ko bulya kamɨ? A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakaʉɓɨkya ambɛ, kambwa kɔkʉ kaalɨka, wika nɨ wemongonyini nganga yɨsaa.»
Yeso ʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓɛ: «Makombomboyonitɔgʉ. Muɓinikyononi Kunzi, mɛɓɨnɨkyana gɔnɨ ɨmɨ.
Ka ndaɓʉ ka Baba ɓapa a ɓayakpʉ. Kiki ɓi ɓɛyɔ, nakakwananigʉ ɓi kamʉɓɨkya ambɛ nogoni kamuɓungusilyogo yi.
Nakaaga kamuɓungusilyogo pa, nigokuto ɓata kamʉva, iba kʉ ɨmɨ niko mino, wikoni iɓunu kʉ gɔ kʉ.
Mibatʉ kʉ no mino kaɨnda, mibatʉ gɔnɨ pisi yi.»
Tʉma aɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, takibigʉ kʉ wo mino kaɨnda. Tiba kʉwa pisi lɨkɨ?»
Yeso aɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Ɨmɨ nɨ pisi, lɨngʉnʉ na ɔɓɨlɨ. Mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kakwananɨgʉ kaɨnda ka Baba nɨ koɓyigʉ pisi kʉ kamɨ.
Makemibo ɓi ɓɨnza, mamibatʉ gɔnɨ ɓi Baba. Katʉkya mbɨya wanʉ, mamibatʉ na maminoni.»
Filipi aɓɨkya ndɨ Yeso ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, tɨwanya kʉwa asɨ Baba aka, ama kʉwa gʉtʉgʉ ɓʉɓwa.»
Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Eze, Filipi, mututu kɛgʉ ɓuwobi wa tiko mino na iɓunu, wakemibagʉ? Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ɛmɨna, aminoni gɔnɨ Baba. Ko bulya ɨkɨ yɔ wo mino kaɓɨkya ɓɛ: ‹Tɨwanya Baba?›
Wakɛgʉ kaɓɨnɨkyana ambɛ, ɨmɨ, na kʉsɔ ka Baba na Baba kʉsɔ kamɨ? Mʉnzɨna masɨ nɨmɔ namʉɓɨkyaga, kopupogigʉ na ɨmɨ, luki limoti, Baba nɨnɔ a kʉsɔ kamɨ nɔ agyaga mogubo kakɨ.
Iɓinikyononi ngbingo yi nɨnɔ no mino kamʉɓɨkya ɓɛ: Ɨmɨ na kʉsɔ ka Baba na Baba a kʉsɔ kamɨ. Makoɓinikyoni ɓɛyɔ, iɓinikyononi gʉtʉgʉ asɨ ko bulya mogubo kakɨ aka.
A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ eɓinikyononi, agya ndɛkɛ mogubo nɨmɔ nagyaga. Agyaga ndɛkɛ gɔnɨ makpʉmʉka makpʉkpʉ kʉgbɛ, kyɛ ɨmɨ nakaaga ka Baba.
Makpʉmʉka masɨ nɨmɔ makʉnga ndɛkɛ ko lino kamɨ, namʉgyɨlyatʉ ndɛkɛ iba Baba avɨ ɨbɨba pisi ko Miki.
Makakʉnga luki ko lino kamɨ, namʉgyɨlyatʉ.»
Yeso omotiloku ndɨ ɓɛ: «Makɛpa, magya mʉtʉʉ kamɨ.
Ɨmɨ, nakʉnga ɓanʉ Baba, amʉpɨ́ mʉtʉ wagɔgɔ nɨnɔ ika na iɓunu ka ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ kamʉtʉngbʉlaga:
mʉtʉ yi nɨ Lɨmbɛngɨ nɨlɔ la lɨngʉnʉ. Ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ ɓakakwananɨgʉ kabaɨlya, kyɛ ɓakamɨnagɨgʉ na ɓakamibogigʉ. Luki limoti, iɓunu mamibatʉ kyɛ ikaga ɓuwobi na iɓunu, na a ka mambɛngɨ kunu.
Nakamʉsɨgʉ ndɛkɛ ɓokwino, nigokuto ndɛkɛ ɓata ɓuwobi na iɓunu.
Otigoli yɨkɛɗɛ, ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ ɓakɛmɨnɨgʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata, luki limoti, iɓunu, mɛmɨnatʉ. Ɨmɨ na na ɔɓɨlɨ, iɓunu mika ndɛkɛ na ɔɓɨlɨ gɔnɨ.
Ka lɨsyɛ li nɨlɔ, mibatʉ ndɛkɛ ɓɛ ɨmɨ na kʉsɔ ka Baba, iɓunu kʉsɔ kamɨ na ɨmɨ kʉsɔ kunu.
Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ibaga mʉtʉʉ kamɨ, agya, ɨyɨ nɔ ɛpaga. Baba apa ndɛkɛ mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ ɛpaga, ɨmɨ napa ndɛkɛ gɔnɨ, nimibisisa kʉ kakɨ.»
Yuda yi nɨmʉ kɛgʉ ndɨ Yuda Isikalioti, amuusa Yeso ɓɛ: «Mombukwono-dosu, ko bulya ɨkɨ yɔ wiwoniso mino ku kusu aka nɨ kɛgʉ ka ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ?»
Yeso asikisya ndɨ ɓɛ: «Mʉmbanzʉ kɛpa, agyatʉ nɨlɔ niko kaɓɨkya. Baba apatʉ, iɓusu na Baba todoku ndɛkɛ kʉ kakɨ, tiko kʉsɔ kakɨ.
Mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ kɛpagɨgʉ, kagyagigʉ nɨlɔ niko kaɓɨkya. Mʉtʉʉ mi nɨmɔ makaʉkana kɛgʉ ma kamɨ, luki limoti a nɨmɔ ka Baba nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ.
Namuɓikyi ɓɛyɔ kyɛ na mbɛyɨ ɓata luga kunu aka.
Luki limoti, mʉtʉ wagɔgɔ nɨnɔ noɓikyi ɓi ambɛ odoku ndɛkɛ kamʉtʉngbʉlaga nɨ Lɨmbɛngɨ-Lotu nɨnɔ Baba atikoku ko lino kamɨ. Ɨyɨ amuwonisila ndɛkɛ makpʉmʉka masɨ, amutomosya masɨ nɨmɔ namʉɓɨkyaga ndɨ.
Namusilyi mazɨyɔ, namʉpá mazɨyɔ kamɨ. Ɨmɨ, nakamupígʉ mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ ɓapága mino. Makombomboyonitɔgʉ ikanɨ kaɓanga.
Mukonito ɓi ɓɛyɔ namuɓikyi ɓi mino ɓɛ: ‹Nogoni, luki limoti, nigokuto ndɛkɛ ɓuwobi na iɓunu.› Kiko ɓi nɨ mɛpagatʉ, gwoni magyagya kyɛ nakaaga ka Baba. A ɓɛyɔ, Baba a mʉtʉ wa ɨbɨba kʉgbɛ kɛkɨtaga ɨmɨ.
Namuɓikyi lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɨ mbɨya wanʉ kanɨ kanigyonosigʉ, kyɛ ngbingo yi nɨnɔ igyonosa ɓanʉ mino, ɓinikyononito.
Nakɛgʉ ɓata na iɓunu na mʉnzɨna manda kyɛ ngama wa ɔɓɨlɨ yi nɨmʉ a kʉwa kodoku. Ɨyɨ kakwananɨgʉ kagya luki gʉtʉgʉ limoti aka,
luki limoti, okwononi ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ ɓibi ɓɛ napagatʉ Baba, na ɨmɨ nagyaga mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ɛkpamya ndɨ mino. Womogoni, totukyini wanʉ.»
«Ɨmɨ nɨ muzabibu ma lɨngʉnʉ, Baba nɔ a mombukwono tiko.
Akɔgɔ tabɨ kamɨ yasɨ nɨyɔ kaɓʉkʉtagɨgʉ. Oɓungusyogo nɨyɔ aɓʉkʉtaga, kyɛ aɓʉkʉtɨ yakpʉ kakɨtaga.
Iɓunu, ma kʉwa ɓɨngɔ pisi ka mʉtɨwɨ nɨmɔ namʉpága ndɨ.
Wikoni kʉsɔ kamɨ, mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ɨmɨ no mino kʉsɔ kunu. Mʉtabɨ mumoti kakwananɨgʉ kaɓʉkʉta bumo yɨkaka nɨ kɛgʉ ka muzabibu. Mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛgɛyɔ, iɓunu makakwananɨgʉ kaɓʉkʉta bumo makiki kʉsɔ kamɨ.
Ɨmɨ nɨ muzabibu, iɓunu ma tabɨ. Nɨnɔ ikaga kʉsɔ kamɨ, ɨmɨ kʉsɔ kakɨ, aɓʉkʉta bumo yakpʉ. A ɓɛyɔ, kiki na ɨmɨ, makakwananɨgʉ kagya luki gʉtʉgʉ limoti aka.
Mʉmbanzʉ kiki kʉsɔ kamɨ, ɓambimba kunzi mʉɗɔngɔnɨ abɛ mʉtabɨ, ʉmɨla. Ɓavaga tabɨ yi nɨyɔ ʉmɨlaga, ɓabʉsya ko ɓuku, agbʉndɨkana.
Makiko kʉsɔ kamɨ na lɨkpʉmʉka kamɨ iko kʉsɔ kunu, kungoni masɨ nɨmɔ makapa, minisanatʉ na imu.
Makaɓʉkʉta bumo yakpʉ, lino ka Baba avatʉ ɨbɨba, kʉwa wa, mɨɨta ndɛkɛ ɓaɓɨɓya kamɨ ɓa lɨngʉnʉ.
Mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ Baba ɛpa mino, namupa ɨmɨ ɓɛgɛyɔ. Wikoni ka sɨpananɨsɔ kamɨ.
Makagya mʉtʉʉ kamɨ, mika ndɛkɛ ka sɨpananɨsɔ kamɨ. Mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ɨmɨ, nagyaga ndɨ mino mʉtʉʉ ka Baba, nikaga ka sɨpananɨsɔ kakɨ.
Namʉɓɨkyaga ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɔ kyɛ gwoni magyagya abɛ ɨmɨ. Ɨgyagya kunu ika kʉwa yidingi kakɨtaga.
Nakamʉpá mʉtʉʉ ambɛ ponononi luga kunu mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ namʉpa ndɨ mino ɨmɨ.
Kɛgʉ na mʉmbanzʉ nɨnɔ a na sɨpananɨsɔ sidingi kakɨtaga mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ apága ɔɓɨlɨ kakɨ ka ɓawai-dakɨ.
Iɓunu, mika ɓawai kika nɨ makagya nɨlɔ ɨmɨ, nakamʉkpamya kagya.
Nakamʉmakɨgʉ ɓata ɓɛ ɓosunzu, kyɛ musunzu kibogigʉ nɨlɔ mombukwana-dakɨ agyaga. Nakamʉmaka ambɛ ɓawai, kyɛ namumibisoni masɨ nɨmɔ nʉkana ndɨ na Baba.
Kɛgʉ iɓunu ɓɔ mɛpʉnaga ndɨ, luki limoti, ɨmɨ nɔ namʉpʉnaga. Namʉtɨka ambɛ windoni, ɓukutogoni bumo na bumo nɨyɔ kikigʉ ndɛkɛ na muliɓo. Kʉwa wa, Baba amʉpá masɨ nɨmɔ makʉngaga ndɛkɛ ko lino kamɨ.
Ka muliɓo, mʉtʉʉ kamɨ nɨma: ponononi luga kunu.»
«Kika nɨ ɔɓɨlɨ akamʉmʉya, wiboni ambɛ apʉnga ndɨ kɛmʉya ɨmɨ kambwa kunu.
Makika ndɨ ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ, ɔɓɨlɨ amʉpatʉ ɓi kyɛ miko ɓi ɓatʉ kakɨ. Luki limoti, ɨmɨ, namupunogoni ndɨ katʉkya luga ka ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ. Iɓunu, makɛgʉ ɓata ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ, kinili ɔɓɨlɨ akamʉmʉya.

Tomononi lɨkpʉmʉka nɨlɔ namʉɓɨkya ndɨ ɓɛ: ‹Musunzu kɛgʉ na ɨbɨba kakɨtaga mombukwana-dakɨ.› Kika nɨ ɓambanzʉ ɓegyogyisa ndɨ, ɓamugyogyiso ndɛkɛ iɓunu ɓɛgɛyɔ. Na kika nɨ ɓagyatʉ ndɨ mʉtɨwɨ kamɨ, ɓagya ndɛkɛ nɨmɔ kunu ɓɛgɛyɔ.
Luki limoti, ɓamʉgya ndɛkɛ nɨmɔ masɨ ko bulya kamɨ, kyɛ ɓakamibigʉ nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ.
Nakoduku ndɨ na nakunzinilyi ndɨ, iba ɓakɛgʉ na ɓʉnyɛ. Mbɨya wanʉ, ɓakɛgʉ ɓata no pisi ya kanganya ɓʉnyɛ kaɓʉ.
Nɨnɔ akɛmʉya, akamʉya gɔnɨ Baba.
Nakogyi ndɨ luga kaɓʉ makpʉmʉka mʉmbanga-mbanga nɨmɔ mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kagyagʉ ndɨ, iba ɓakɛgʉ na ɓʉnyɛ. Mbɨya wanʉ, ɓɨnatʉ ndɨ, luki limoti, ɓa asɨ katɨmʉya aka iɓusu na Baba.
Luki limoti, igyonosa ndɨ ɓɛyɔ kyɛ ɨtʉlyanɨ lɨkpʉmʉka nɨlɔ ɓokpika ndɨ ka mʉtʉʉ kaɓʉ ɓɛ: ‹Ɓɛmʉya ndɨ payaya aka.›
Namutikilyokuto ndɛkɛ kotukyoku ka Baba, mʉtʉ nɨnɔ ikaga ndɛkɛ kamʉtʉngbʉlaga. Mʉtʉ yi nɨ Lɨmbɛngɨ la lɨngʉnʉ nɨlɔ akodoku ka Baba. Ɨyɨ nɔ ika ndɛkɛ dɛmʉ kamɨ.
Na iɓunu mika ndɛkɛ ɓadɛmʉ kamɨ gɔnɨ, kyɛ ma ndɨ pa imoti na ɨmɨ katʉkya ka mʉpʉnganagɨ.»
«Namʉɓɨkya ndɨ makpʉmʉka nɨmɔ kyɛ makotukyonitɔgʉ ka baya kunu.
Ɓamukpumyagatʉ ndɛkɛ ka ɓandaɓʉ ɓaya malʉmba. Na ngbingo atʉ ndɛkɛ kodoku nɨnɔ ɓamʉmwɔgɔ ndɛkɛ mino, ɓanasɨma ɓɛ ɓakapá Kunzi apɛpɛ.
Ɓagyaga ndɛkɛ ɓɛyɔ kyɛ ɓakamibigʉ Baba, gʉtʉgʉ ɨmɨ aka.
Luki limoti, namuɓikyi ɓɛyɔ kyɛ wa ngbingo yi nɨnɔ ɨtʉlyana ndɛkɛ mino, matamana ɓɛ, ɨmɨ, namʉɓɨkyatʉ ndɨ.»
«Nakamʉɓɨkyagʉ ndɨ katʉkya ka mʉpʉnganagɨ, kyɛ ta ndɨ pa imoti na iɓunu.
Mbɨya wanʉ, nanɨga kʉ ka mʉtʉ yi nɨnɔ etikoku ndɨ. Na mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kɛgʉ kemuuso ɓɛ: ‹Wakaɨnda yanɨ?›
Luki limoti, yɛkɨ namuɓikyi ɓɛyɔ, kumbu amutumini kʉwa ka mambɛngɨ ɓɨɗɛ.
Wɨna sɛ, ɨmɨ, nakamʉɓɨkya lɨngʉnʉ. A ɨzangɨa kunu ɓɛ ɨmɨ naga. A ɓɛyɔ, nakogo, nɨnɔ akwanana ndɛkɛ kamʉtʉngbʉlaga kamudulyikugʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata. Luki limoti, nakaga, namutikilyokuto ndɛkɛ.
Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ odoku ndɛkɛ mino, uwonisila ndɛkɛ ɓɨngbanganya ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ yi nɨmʉ ko bulya ɓʉnyɛ, bulyo ɓungbingbili na bulyo mʉngɨmbɔ ko Kunzi.
Ko bulyo ɓʉnyɛ, kyɛ ɓakapagʉ kaɓɨnɨkyana.
Ko bulyo ɓungbingbili, kyɛ nakaaga ka Baba na makɛmɨnɨgʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata.
Ko bulyo mʉngɨmbɔ ko Kunzi, kyɛ ɓokoni ndɨ mʉngɨmbɔ ka ngama wa ɔɓɨlɨ yi nɨmʉ.
Na ɓata na makpʉmʉka mudingi kamʉɓɨkya. Luki limoti, makakwananɨgʉ kabɨnɨka ɓuti ɓi mbɨya wanʉ.

Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ Lɨmbɛngɨ la lɨngʉnʉ odoku ndɛkɛ mino, amukpokyonisaga ndɛkɛ ka lɨngʉnʉ aka. A ɓɛyɔ, kanzɨnagɨgʉ ndɛkɛ ko lino kakɨ ɓɨkpɛ. Luki limoti, aɓɨkyaga ndɛkɛ masɨ nɨmɔ ʉkanaga na amʉɓɨkyaga makpʉmʉka nɨmɔ igyonosa ndɛkɛ.
Owonisaga ndɛkɛ ɨbɨba kamɨ kyɛ makpʉmʉka masɨ nɨmɔ amʉɓɨkyaga ndɛkɛ, opupaga ndɛkɛ ka nɨmɔ a kʉsɔ kamɨ.
Makpʉmʉka masɨ nɨmɔ ka Baba a makamɨ gɔnɨ. Kinili namuɓikyi ambɛ makpʉmʉka masɨ nɨmɔ Lɨmbɛngɨ amʉɓɨkyaga ndɛkɛ, opupaga ndɛkɛ ka nɨmɔ a kʉsɔ kamɨ.»
«Osikoni yɨkɛɗɛ, makɛmɨnɨgʉ ɓata, kumbuso wo ngbinga mʉkɛɗɛ mɛmɨnatʉ ɓata.»

Ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓagɔgɔ ɓapʉnga kʉwa ndɨ kaimuuso luga kaɓʉ ɓɛ: «Lɨkpʉmʉka tino lɔ akatɨɓɨkya lɔ? Akatɨɓɨkya ɓɛ: ‹Osikoni yɨkɛɗɛ, makɛmɨnɨgʉ ɓata, na kumbuso wo ngbinga mʉkɛɗɛ mɛmɨnatʉ ɓata›. Na ɓɛ: ‹Nakaɨnda ka Baba.›»
Ɓisisilaga ndɨ kaimuuso ɓɛ: «Nɨyɔ akaɓɨkya ɓɛ: ‹Ngbinga mʉkɛɗɛ› isi yi nɨ ɨkɨ? Takɛgʉ kaiba ikanɨ akanzɨna ko bulyo luki tino.»
Yeso iba ndɨ ɓɛ ɓa ndɨ kapa kamuuso lɨkpʉmʉka. Ʉɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Makaimuuso ko bulya lɨkpʉmʉka nɨlɔ namuɓikyi ɓi ɓɛ: ‹Osikoni yɨkɛɗɛ, makɛmɨnɨgʉ ɓata, na kumbuso wo ngbinga mʉkɛɗɛ mɛmɨnatʉ ɓata?›

A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, iɓunu, magamanatʉ ndɛkɛ, mogulya ko kumbu. Luki limoti, ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ ɓogwa ndɛkɛ ɨɓʉ magyagya. Iɓunu, mika ndɛkɛ ko kumbu luki limoti, kumbu kunu oyikana ndɛkɛ magyagya.
Ngbingo nɨnɔ muko o mino kaɓʉkʉta, ikaga ko kumbu kyɛ a ngbingo kakɨ wa yigyogyiso. Luki limoti, kaɓʉkʉta, katamanɨgʉ ɓata yigyogyiso yi nɨyɔ. Ikaga kʉwa na magyagya kyɛ oɓukutini.
Iɓunu gɔnɨ, ma ko kumbu mbɨya wanʉ. Luki limoti, namʉmɨnatʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata nɨ mambɛngɨ amutumini na magyagya ɓɨɗɛ. Mʉmbanzʉ gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti aka kamʉkʉpyɨgʉ ndɛkɛ magyagya mi nɨmɔ.
Ka lɨsyɛ li nɨlɔ, makemuusigʉ ndɛkɛ ɓata lɨkpʉmʉka gʉtʉgʉ limoti aka. A lɨngʉnʉ, a lɨngʉnʉ, nakamʉɓɨkya ambɛ, Baba amʉpátʉ masɨ nɨmɔ makʉngaga ndɛkɛ ko lino kamɨ.
Kadwɛ na lɨsyɛ nɨlɨ, makonokungigʉ luki ko lino kamɨ. Kungoni, minisanatʉ nolu iba ɨgyagya kunu iki kʉwa yidingi.»

Yeso oɓikyoku ɓata ɓɛ: «Namʉɓɨkyaga ndɨ makpʉmʉka mi nɨmɔ masɨ pisi ka mozuni. Ngbingo odokuto ndɛkɛ nɨnɔ nakamʉnzɨnɨlyɨgʉ ɓata mino ɓɛyɔ, luki limoti, namʉnzɨnɨlya ndɛkɛ ɓɨngbanganya ko bulya ka Baba.
Ka lɨsyɛ li nɨlɔ, makʉngaga ndɛkɛ Baba makpʉmʉka masɨ ko lino kamɨ. Nakɛgʉ kamʉɓɨkya ambɛ ɨmɨ nɔ namʉkʉngʉlyaga ndɛkɛ.
A ɓɛyɔ, ɨyɨ Baba ɓɨkpɛ amʉpagatʉ, kyɛ iɓunu, mɛpagatʉ, maɓɨnɨkyana ɓɛ notukyoku ndɨ ko Kunzi.
Notukyoku ndɨ ka Baba, nodoku ka ɔɓɨlɨ. Mbɨya wanʉ, nakasa ɔɓɨlɨ, nɨga ka Baba.»
Ɓaɓɨɓya kakɨ ɓaɓɨkya kʉwa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Iyaaa, mbɨya wanʉ, wa kʉwa kanzɨna ɓɨngbanganya. Wakɛgʉ ɓata katwa mozuni.
Mbɨya wanʉ, takaiba ambɛ wibaga makpʉmʉka masɨ, kɛgʉ ɓata na ɨzangɨya ɓɛ mʉmbanzʉ umuusito ɓata lɨkpʉmʉka. Kinili, takaɓɨnɨkyana ɓɛ wotukyoku ndɨ ko Kunzi.»
Yeso umuusa ndɨ ɓɛ: «Moɓinikyonini sɛ kʉwa mbɨya wanʉ?

Ɛɛɛ, ngbingo a sɛ kodoku, itulyonini, nɨnɔ momisikana ndɛkɛ mino ɓingbwi, mʉmbanzʉ yɨkaka-yɨkaka ɨmagalya ka nakpangbala kakɨ. Ngbingo nɨnɔ mɛsa ndɛkɛ mino mʉkaka ɓɨnvʉɓʉ. Luki limoti, nakɛgʉ mʉkaka kyɛ Baba a pa imoti na ɨmɨ.
Namʉɓɨkya ndɨ masɨ nɨmɔ kyɛ winisononi na mazɨyɔ kʉsɔ kamɨ. Migyogyisatʉ ndɛkɛ ka ɔɓɨlɨ. Luki limoti, makoɓongonitɔgʉ. Ɨmɨ, noɗitoni ndɨ masɨ ka ɔɓɨlɨ ɓɨnvɨ.»
Nɨyɔ Yeso ama kanzɨna ɓɛyɔ, ɨkwɛ ndɨ kʉgʉ wa lɨsyɛ, aɓɨkya ɓɛ: «Babooo, ngbingo itulyonini. Mubibiso mikakʉ, kyɛ ɨyɨ ubibisi gɔnɨ.
Wapóni ndɨ ɓʉngama kʉgʉ ka ɓambanzʉ ɓasɨ, kyɛ ʉpɨ́ ɓatʉ ɓasɨ nɨɓɔ wapá ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ.
Ɔɓɨlɨ wa ɓɛnzɛ na ɓɛnzɛ yi nɨ kaumibo ɨwɛ, Kunzi ɓemoti, nɨnɔ walɨngʉnʉ na ɨmɨ Yeso-Kilisito nɨnɔ wetikoku ndɨ.
Ɨmɨ, nubibisoni kʉnʉ ka ɔɓɨlɨ. Nomoni ligubo nɨlɔ wetikoku ndɨ kagya.
Babooo, mbɨya wanʉ, imigisyoku ɨbɨba ɓuwobi na ɨwɛ, ɨbɨba mʉɗɔngɔnɨ abɛ nɨyɔ nikaga ndɨ noyu kʉ kakʉ kambwa wagyɨ ɔɓɨlɨ.
Numibisikosoni ka ɓatʉ nɨɓɔ ʉpʉnaga ndɨ ka ɔɓɨlɨ, wɛpá. Ɓa ndɨ ɓatʉ kakʉ, wepóku, ɓoɓuulyogo lɨkpʉmʉka kakʉ.
Mbɨya yi nɨmʉ, ɓakaiba ɓɛ masɨ nɨmɔ wɛpá ndɨ, apʉnya kʉ kakʉ.
Kyɛ nukitisyaga ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka nɨlɔ aka lɔ wɛɓɨkyaga ndɨ, ɓaɓɨnɨkyana. Ɓiba ndɨ ka lɨngʉnʉ ɓɛ nopunyoku kʉ kakʉ na kaɓɨnɨkyana ɓɛ ɨwɛ nɔ wetikoku ndɨ.
Ɨmɨ, nakaʉkʉngɨlya. Nakɛgʉ kaʉkʉngɨlya ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ, luki limoti, nɨɓɔ wɛpá ndɨ kyɛ ɓa kʉwa ɓatʉ kakʉ.
Masɨ nɨmɔ na nomu a ma kakʉ na nɨmɔ kakʉ a ma kamɨ, ɨbɨba kamɨ akainisoniso ko pisi kaɓʉ.

Nakɛgʉ ɓata ka ɔɓɨlɨ, luki limoti ɨɓʉ ɓa mbɛyɨ kʉ kwa kʉ, wɨna sɛ, ɨmɨ nakaaga kʉ kakʉ. Baba Wotuooo, huɓuulyogo ko ngu yo lino kakʉ. Lino nɨlɔ wɛpá ndɨ, kyɛ ɓiki luki limoti mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ iɓusu to mino na ɨwɛ.

Ngbingo yi nɨnɔ nikaga ndɨ mino pa imoti na ɨɓʉ, nuɓuulyaga ndɨ ko ngu yo lino kakʉ nɨlɔ wɛpá ndɨ. Nuɓuulyaga ndɨ ɓɨnza na gʉtʉgʉ ɓemoti luga kaɓʉ koɓungagagʉ ndɨ, kiki nɨnɔ aka nɔ oɓungaga ndɨ kyɛ Moɓiso Motu ɨtʉlyanɨ.
Mbɨya wanʉ, nakaaga kʉ kakʉ. Nakaɓɨkya lɨkpʉmʉka li nɨlɨ nɨ na mbɛyɨ ɓata ka ɔɓɨlɨ aka iba ɨgyagya kamɨ iki ɓɨɗɛ kʉsɔ kaɓʉ.
Ɨmɨ, nʉɓɨkya ndɨ lɨkpʉmʉka kakʉ, na ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ ɓʉmʉya ndɨ ɓɨkanganga kyɛ ɨɓʉ mʉɗɔngɔnɨ abɛ ɨmɨ gɔnɨ takɛgʉ ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ.
Nakɛgʉ kalʉmba ambɛ hʉtʉmba ka ɔɓɨlɨ, luki limoti, huɓuulyogo ka mumuyoniso.
Ɨɓʉ mʉɗɔngɔnɨ abɛ ɨmɨ gɔnɨ takɛgʉ ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ.
Huɓuɓisa ɓitu pisi ka lɨngʉnʉ, kyɛ mʉnzɨna kakʉ nɨ lɨngʉnʉ.
Nakaʉtɨka ka ɔɓɨlɨ mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ wɛtikoku ndɨ gɔnɨ mino ɨmɨ.
Nakaʉpá ɔɓɨlɨ kamɨ abɛ apɛpɛ ko bulya kaɓʉ, kyɛ ɓɨpɨ́ gɔnɨ ɨɓʉ na lɨngʉnʉ kʉ kakʉ.
Nakɛgʉ kahʉlʉmbɨlya ɓaɓɨɓya ɓi nɨɓana aka ɓa, luki limoti, nakaʉlʉmbɨlya gɔnɨ ɓatʉ ɓasɨ nɨɓɔ ɓʉkana ndɛkɛ mʉtʉʉ kaɓʉ, ɓɛɓɨnɨkyana.
Nakalʉmba kyɛ ɨɓʉ ɓasɨ ɓiki luki limoti, mʉɗɔngɔnɨ ɓɛyɔ ɨwɛ Baba wo mino kʉsɔ kamɨ na ɨmɨ kʉsɔ kakʉ. Ɨɓʉ gɔnɨ ɓiki luki limoti kyɛ ɓatʉ ɓa ɔɓɨlɨ ɓaɓɨnɨkyanɨ ɓɛ ɨwɛ nɔ wetikoku ndɨ.
